Since the death of his father, Edgar wants to take care of his mother; for this reason he seeks a loan from MFP to buy a plot of land for he and his mother to live on. This will be his 1st credit with MFP and he is committed to prompt repayment. With 2,000 nuevos soles he will be able to buy a plot of land and live happily with his mother.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en: Bernard, 29 years old, is married and has one child who is five years old. He owns a general store where he sells various goods such as shoes, umbrellas and utensils. He has four years of experience in this business. Bernard has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company to purchase various goods such as shoes, umbrellas and utensils to sell. He will use any profits to reinvest in his business and to pay children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more items to sell, like shoes, umbrellas and utensils.

loans.name: Hector Dario

texts.es:
Hector es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y siempre querer ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Hector aprendió la actividad de la confección desde hace mucho tiempo, y con esta actividad es que ha generado los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Trabajó durante mucho tiempo en una empresa de confecciones donde adquirió la experiencia, y posteriormente decidió montar su propio taller de confección donde ofrece el servicio de la confección a terceros. Debido a que Hector monto su taller con muy bajo capital, aún le falta comprar algunas máquinas; esto se ve reflejado en las ocasiones que debe dirigirse hacia otros talleres donde le prestan una máquina fileteadora para poder terminar sus trabajos. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación, Hector espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina fileteadora para poder así ofrecer el servicio completo a sus clientes y poder así captar más clientes.

Hector espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues no tendrá que pagar por arrendar una máquina para terminar sus procesos. Además, como Hector está empezando a sacar su línea propia, esto le ayudará enormemente para poder sacar productos de la mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Hector is a person who is known for being very hard-working.  He always wants to give his family a better quality of life.

Hector learned the sewing trade a long time ago.  Through this business activity he has generated the income needed to support his household.  He worked for a long time for a sewing company, which is where he got his experience.  Later he decided to set up his own sewing shop where he offers his sewing services to third parties.

Because Hector set up his shop with very little capital, he still needs to buy some machines.  This is evident on the occasions when he needs to go to other shops where they lend him a overlock machine to be able to finish his jobs.

With the intent of improving this situation, Hector hopes that a loan will give him the opportunity to buy an overlocking machine.  This way he will be able to offer his customers complete service, and he will be able to get more customers.

Hector hopes that this way his income will increase considerably.  He will not have to pay to rent a machine in order to finish his work.  Also, as Hector is starting his own line, this will help enormously in order to be able to make the best quality products.

loans.use: to buy an overlocking machine in order to offer customers complete service and to get more customers.

loans.name: Sophanny

texts.en:
Sophanny (in the photo), age 38, is single. She lives with her widowed mother in a village about fifteen kilometers form Phnom Penh, the capital city of Cambodia.  

Sophanny is a garment worker. She is applying for her first loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase a motorcycle to get work because she commutes to work by bike.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle for commuting.

loans.name: Jean Claude

texts.en:
Jean Claude is 26 years old and single. He has been selling clothes for two years and works every day from 6 a.m. until 8 p.m. He employs two people to help him.

Jean Claude has requested a loan from Kiva field partner Vision Finance Company in order to expand his business by buying more clothes to sell. He plans to reinvest in his business and save money for his future

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Seng

texts.en:
Seng, 39 years old, and her husband, Heang, 40 years old (pictured together), live in a village approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1992 and have four sons and five daughters. Two are garment workers and others attend school.   

Seng and her husband are farmers. Besides farming, Heang also does construction work. 

Seng is asking for her first loan of $600 to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticides to maintain her farm. She will also use a part of the loan to build a fence around her house.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticides to maintain her farm, and to build a fence around her house.

loans.name: Sina

texts.en:
Sina (in the photo), age 33, is a garment worker. Her husband, Sarit, is 34. They have been married since 1999 and have four children, one son and three daughters, who attend school. .

Sina and her husband grow rice during the rice season. Sina's parents, who are also rice farmers, live with her. The family lives in a village about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Sina is asking for a loan of $1,000 to purchase a water pump, fertilizer and pesticides to maintain her farm.

loans.use: To purchase a water pump, fertilizer and pesticides to maintain her rice farm.

loans.name: Nouch

texts.en:
Nouch (in the photo), age 26, is a taxi driver. His wife, Neang, age 25, is a garment worker. They have been married since 2009 and have just one young son. They live about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Nouch is asking for a loan of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for his wife to get to work.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike for his wife to get to work.

loans.name: Erkaboi

texts.ru: Эркабой добросовестный и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота и выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Отходы от выращивания сельхозкультур идут на корм скота. Жена помогает по бизнесу, и они вместе дружно работают и старается улучшить свое благосостояние семьи. Эркабой запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки 3 голов крупного рогатого скота и корма для них. А также на остальную сумму хочет купить семян ячменя для посева.
texts.en: Erkaboi is a conscientious and goal-oriented man. He is married and has four children. Erkaboi has been farming and raising cattle for more then 10 years. He uses stalks and leaf leftovers from his harvest to make feed for his cows. Erkaboi's wife helps with the farm and the two work well together to improve their family's financial well being. Erkaboi is requesting a loan of 5000 somoni to purchase three more cows and feed for them. He is also planning to use the leftover money to buy barley seeds for planting.

loans.use: To buy seeds, cattle and feeds for them

loans.name: Von

texts.en:
Von (in the photo), age 32, is a taxi driver. His wife, Chanret, age 30, stays at home and takes care of their children. They live in a suburb of Phnom Penh and they have one son who attends first grade. 

Von is applying for his first loan of $500 to repair his taxi which often breaks down.

loans.use: To repair his taxi.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora, es una mujer hacendosa y muy alegre, tiene 44 años y vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Alejandro de 49 años y sus 04 hijos a quienes le desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Teodora es muy empeñosa al tener que  labrar la tierra para sembrar plantas de cacao en su propio campo de cultivo; este actividad lleva realizando hace mas de 18 años con el apoyo de su esposo; a ella le gusta elaborar este trabajo ya que es lo que más sabe hacer y le es muy difícil llevar sus sacos de cosecha hasta los centros de acopio quienes le remuneran buenas ganancias por cada kilogramo de su producción. En los tiempos de lluvia, ella dice que las plagas aprovechan en malograr sus frutos; es por ello que acude a las oficinas de MFP para poder solicitar un crédito que le apoye en mantener muy sanos sus sembríos. Sus planes a futuro es incrementar mas plantas de cacao de este modo sus hijos podrán tener una buena educación. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP y su compromiso es ser puntual con las cuotas de pago. Asimismo, en su banco comunal es una socia responsable. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, realizará el mantenimiento de sus plantas comprando productos agroquímicos y abono; para ser fumigadas y fertilizadas.
texts.en:
Teodora is a hardworking and very happy woman, 44, who lives in her own house with her husband, Alejandro, 49, and their four children for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. Teodora  works very hard tilling the land to sow cacao pants in her own fields. She has been farming for more than 18 years with her husband’s help. She enjoys doing this work since it is what she knows how to do best. It is very difficult for her to take her harvest to the collection centers where they pay her a good profit for each kilogram of production.  

Teodora says that during the rainy season, pests take advantage to damage her crops. Consequently she has come to the offices of MFP to apply for a loan that will enable her to keep her fields very healthy. Her future plans are to increase her cacao plants so that her children will be able to have a good education. This will be her third loan with MFP and her commitment is to be punctual in making her payments. In addition, she is a responsible member of her communal bank. With the 2,000 nuevos soles, she will do upkeep on her plants by buying agrochemicals and fertilizer so they will be fumigated and fertilized.

loans.use: to purchase agrochemicals and bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.ru: Ахмад женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Его дети уже взрослые и помогают отцу на содержания семьи. Более 20 лет Ахмад занимается разведением и продажей скота. Имеет 2 голов крупного и 15 голов мелкого рогатого скота, также имеет хорошие условия на содержания скота. Кроме данного бизнеса он занимается выращиванием картофеля. От полученного дохода он намерен расширить свой бизнес. Ахмад запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ahmad is married and a responsible father of two children. His kids are adults and help his father to support the family. Ahmad has been raising livestock for sale for more then twenty years. He has two cows and 15 goats/sheep and good barns to keep his animals. Ahmad also raises potatoes for sale and invests his profits to expand his business. Ahmad is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase more livestock. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Nuridin

texts.ru: Нуридин женат, ему 38 лет. На воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 17 лет он занимается выращиванием и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Данный момент имеет 2 голов крупного рогатого скота.  Также занимается выращиванием картофеля и пшеницы. В бизнесе помогает жена. Он хочет получить хорошую прибыль. Часть прибыли направляет на улучшения жилищных условий, а остальную часть использует на расширения бизнеса. Нуридин запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки 2 голов крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Nuridin is 38 years old, married and has two children. He has been farming and raising livestock for sale for more then 17 years. Currently Nuridin has two cows and also grows potatoes and wheat. His wife helps him with the farm. Nuridin wants to increase his profits so he uses a portion of the income to improve their house, but also expands his business. He is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase two more cows for his herd.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Olim

texts.ru: Олим женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и честный человек. Более 5 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота, имеет хорошую условию на содержания скота. Кроме скотоводства он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции. Жена помогает по бизнесу. Олим хотел бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки 3 голов крупного и 2 голов мелкого рогатого скота. А также на остальную сумму хочет купить горюче-смазочных материалов, семян ячменя и пшеницы. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Olim is married and has three children. He is a hardworking and honest man. Olim has been farming and raising cattle for five years and has good facilities for the animals. His wife helps manage the farm. Olim is asking for a loan of 5000 somoni to purchase three cows and two sheep. He plans to use the rest of the money to purchase fuel as well as barley and wheat seed. Olim hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Victor

texts.ru:
Виктор просит предоставить ему кредит на закупку печатной продукции, канцтоваров и сувениров. Предыдущий кредит был также потрачен на расширение ассортимента, что привело к получению дополнительной прибыли.
Виктор оптимистичен и целеустремлен. Он хочет развивать свой бизнес дальше для того, чтобы содержать свою семью, которую он сильно любит.
texts.en: Victor is asking for loan to purchase newspapers, magazines, office supplies and souvenirs. His past loan also went for the same purpose which has resulted in improved profits for Victor. Victor is optimistic and goal-oriented. He wants to further improve his business so that he can support his family whom he loves dearly.

loans.use: to restock items for sale

loans.name: Stanislav

texts.ru: Станислав женат, имеет маленькую дочь. Вот уже три года, как Станислав занимается выращиванием ранних овощей – помидоров, огурцев, редиса. Раньше он жил в большом городе на востоке Украины. Но там стало трудно с работой. Поэтому Станислав переехал в Каменку и начал свой бизнес. Сегодня у Станислава есть три большие теплица, а также две маленькие теплица для выращивания рассады. Дохода вполне хватает для того, чтобы содержать свою семью. Станислав планирует развивать свой бизнес дальше. Он просит предоставить ему кредит для установки отопления в теплицах. Это поможет ему получать более ранний урожай и соответственно большую прибыль.
texts.en: Stanisav is married and has a young daughter. For the last three years Stanislav has been growing early vegetables - tomatoes, cucumbers and radishes. Previously Stanislav lived in a big city in eastern Ukraine, but there was little work to be found there. That is why Stanislav moved to Kamenka and started his farming business. To this date he has three big greenhouses and also a few small ones for growing seedlings. His profits are enough to support his family but Stansilav wants to expand his business. He is requesting a loan to install heating in his greenhouses. This will allow him to get an even earlier harvest and bigger profits.

loans.use: to install heating in greenhouses

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назире 31 год, замужем, воспитывает двух дочек 5 и 2 лет. В поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи, в 2006 году Назира начала свой бизнес в животноводстве со стартовой суммой 12,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Назиры, на сегодня  ее хозяйство приносит около 2,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. Для дальнейшего расширения своего бизнеса, Назира обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коз. Доходы Назира планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Nazira is 31 years old, married, and is raising two daughters who are 5 and 2. While looking for a source of income for her family, Nazira started her own livestock business in 2006 with an initial sum of 12,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Nazira's hard work, today her business earns around 2,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of meat and dairy products. In order to continue growing her business, Nazira has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to purchase goats. Nazira plans to invest her profits into further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Vuqar

texts.en:
Vuqar is a 42-year-old man, married with three children. He is a very hardworking, dedicated person. For the past 5 years, he has worked selling office supplies in the market. Two or three times a month he gets his goods from the city's central market.

In addition, he sells toys and perfumery. His wife helps him with his business. The key to his success is his friendliness to customers. Vuqar`s customers are school children and their parents, which require particular attitude. His monthly income is 300 AZN.

Vuqar would like to get a 1,500 AZN loan for to purchase and office supplies and toys in order to expand his business. This will be his 2nd loan and Vuqar has a positive loan history.

loans.use: to buy office supplies and toys.

loans.name: Leonidas Q

texts.es: Trabajador y muy empeñoso es el señor Leonidas, de 38 años, vive en su propia casa a base de madera; con la señora Santa de 30 años y son padres de 05 hijos a quienes desea brindar un buen bienestar. Leonidas, es un hombre muy responsable y se preocupa por la felicidad de su familia; lleva 28 años realizando la actividad de labrar la tierra para luego cultivar plantas de café, producción que tiene más de 02  hectáreas.  En tiempos de cosecha siempre cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y de jornaleros quienes le apoyan en la extracción de sus frutos. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder sacar una buena ganancia con los productos vendidos en los centros de acopio, lugar donde compra su cosechas, así logra tener dinero para el sustento de su familia. Por otro lado Leonidas acude a MFP para que pueda abrir una tienda de abarrotes  para su esposa, mientras él labora los trabajos de su chacra. Sus planes a futuro es hacer crecer su producción con más plantas de café y así darles una buena educación a sus cinco hijos. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP; se compromete a ser muy puntual con sus cuotas de pago ya que tiene en cuenta que si es cumplidor, podrá acceder a otro crédito. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará insumos como: arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche, entre otros. Así podrá abrir la tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Leonidas, 38, is very hardworking. He lives in his own home, a wooden structure, with Sra. Santa, 30, and they are the parents of five children for whom he wants to provide a sense of well being. 

Leonidas is a very responsible man and is concerned about his family’s happiness. He has spent 28 years tilling the soil to cultivate coffee plants and has 2 hectares (about 4.94 acres) under production. At harvest time, he always relies on the help of his children and day laborers to help him extract the seeds from his coffee plants. What he most enjoys about his work is being able to earn a good profit from the products sold at the collection centers, a place where they buy his harvest so that he will have money to support his family.

Leonidas has come to MFP in order to be able to open a grocery store for his wife, while he continues to farm on his plot of land. His future plans are to increase his production with more coffee plants and thus provide a good education for his five children. This will  be his first loan with MFP and he is committed to being very punctual with his payments, since he is aware that if he is trustworthy, he will be able to apply for a future loan.. With the 3,000 nuevos soles, he will buy supplies such as rice, sugar, noodles and milk among other items. Thus, he will be able to open the grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, noodles and milk.

loans.name: Dolly

texts.es:
Dolly se encuentra casada y es madre de 4 hijos a quienes siempre les quiso ofrecer una buena calidad de vida. Debido a circunstancias adversas en su vida, Dolly no pudo ofrecerle a sus hijos una educación universitaria, o una estabilidad económica suficiente para progresar como ellos querían, sin embargo, siempre les ofreció lo mejor que estaba a su alcance y lucho fuertemente para poderlos sacar adelante. Dolly desde hace aproximadamente 1 año montó una papelería debido a que por problemas de salud tuvo que renunciar a su empleo. Como debía seguir generando ingresos con los cuales contribuyera junto con su esposo a la generación de ingresos para su hogar, Dolly montó su negocio el cual puede atender en la disponibilidad de tiempo que ella tenga y no tiene que estar al cuidado de una responsabilidad con un jefe. El negocio de Dolly es una papelería, miscelánea donde ofrece a sus clientes una variedad de productos con los cuales pueden satisfacer sus necesidades. Con el ánimo de aumentar la cantidad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes, Dolly espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de papelería como cuadernos, lapiceros, cartulinas, entre otros.

Dolly espera que de esta manera pueda hacer más atractivo su negocio para los clientes y así generar mayores ventas. Dolly sueña con ofrecer empleo en su negocio para las personas más necesitadas y a su esposo y a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dolly is married and the mother of four children, to whom she has always wanted to offer a good quality of life. Because of adverse circumstances in her life, Dolly was not able to provide her children a university education or sufficient financial stability for them to progress as they would have liked. However, she always provided the best she could afford, and struggled hard to help them succeed.

Dolly set up her stationery store approximately one year ago, due to the fact that she had to quit her job because of health problems.  She had to continue generating income, so that together with her husband she could contribute to the household income. So Dolly set up a business that she can run in the time she has available, and not have to be looking after job responsibilities and have a boss.  

Dolly's business is a stationery and notions store, where she offers her customers a variety of products to satisfy their needs.

With the intention of increasing the quantity of products she offers her customers, Dolly hopes that a loan will give her the chance to purchase paper products such as notebooks, pens, poster board and other goods. Dolly hopes that this way she can make her business more attractive for customers, and generate higher sales. 

Dolly dreams of providing employment in her business for the people who need it most, and of giving her husband and children a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy stationery products such as notebooks, pens, and poster board.

loans.name: Marie Louise

texts.en: Marie Louise, 36 years old, is married and has two children aged between 5 and 9 years old. Her business is well organized. She sells cassava flour, working from 6 a.m. until 6 p.m. every day. Marie Louise has two years of experience in this business and she currently employs one person to help her. Marie Louise has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase large quantities of cassava flour for resale. She will use any profit generated from this loan to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase more cassava flour.

loans.name: Sylvestre

texts.en:
Sylvestre is 27 years old and is married with one child who is one year old. He owns a business selling various goods such as: soap, lotions, soft drinks (fanta, juice and water), biscuits, etc. This is his fifth year in this business and he works from 7am until 6pm every day.

Sylvestre has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various goods such as: soap, lotions, soft drinks (fanta, juice and water), biscuits, etc., to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase various goods such as soap, lotions, soft drinks (fanta, juice  and water), biscuits etc to sell.

loans.name: Yekaterina

texts.ru:
Екатерина занимается выращиванием ранних овощей в теплицах. Она уже пользовалась кредитными средствами для постройки небольшой теплицы для рассады. В этот раз Екатерина просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 15,000 гривен для закупки семян, пленки и удобрений. 

Екатерина раньше жила в городе. От родителей в наследство остался дом в селе. Продавать не захотела, поэтому переехала и начала заниматься сельским хозяйством. Екатерине нравится этот бизнес. В планах на развитие - постройка еще 4 теплиц. У нее большая семья - трое взрослых детей и 6 внуков. Все живут рядом большой и дружной семьей.
texts.en:
Yekaterina grows early vegetables in greenhouses. She has previously used the lending system to build a small greenhouse for seedlings. Currently she is requesting another loan of 15,000 griven to purchase seeds, plastic foil and fertilizer. 

Yekaterina used to live in the city, but she inherited a house in the country from her parents. She chose not to sell the house but to move and start a farming business. Yekaterina likes being a farmer. In the future she plans to expand her farm and build four more greenhouses. Yekaterina has a large family - three children and six grandchildren. They all live nearby and are a large and very friendly family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, plastic foil and fertilizer

loans.name: Zhurabek

texts.ru: Журабек трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более 6 лет он занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес для того чтобы улучшить благосостояние семьи. Журабек запрашивает займ в размере 2500 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче- смазочных материалов. Он надеется на вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en: Zhurabek is a hard-working and driven person. He is married and is raising four children. For over 6 years, Zhurabek has been growing crops. He would like to expand his business in order to improve the well-being of his family. Zhurabek is requesting a loan of 2500 somoni to purchase mineral fertilizers, as well as fuel and lubricants. He is hoping for your kindness and compassion.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Tolkun

texts.ru: Толкун 43 года. В качестве основного источника финансирования для своей семьи, в 2007 году Толкун начала заниматься животноводством. Начатое с кредита компании «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS)  в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов.  Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Толкун обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одного теленка и минеральных удобрений. Доходы Толкун планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Tolkun is 43 years old. In 2007 Tshe started a livestock business and now it is the main source of income for her family. The farm was started with a 30,000 som (KGS) loan from "Bai-Tushum and partners" and currently it yields 10,000 som(KGS) monthly profits, mainly from meat and milk sales. To expand her business further Tolkun has again turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 40,000 som(KGS) which she will use to buy another calf and fertilizer. She is planning to use profits from this loan to further expand her herd.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de salir adelante le han permitido superar las dificultades y continuar progresando al lado de su familia. Edgar es padre soltero de 3 hijos, pues la madre de sus hijos los abandonó hace un tiempo. Debido a que tenía que empezar a generar mayores ingresos con los cuales pudiera sostener los gastos de su hogar, Edgar decidió montar su negocio donde ofrece bebidas y licores a sus clientes. Edgar tuvo un tiempo de muchas crisis, pues su municipio tenía influencias de grupos armados, lo que hacía que sus ventas fueran muy bajas durante un gran tiempo. Gracias a su fortaleza pudo salir de esta dificultad y actualmente sigue atendiendo su negocio y generando los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Debido a que el refrigerador donde guarda las bebidas de su negocio se encuentra en un estado donde ya requiere ser remplazado, Edgar busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de un refrigerador para poder guardar sus bebidas, debido a que el refrigerador que tiene actualmente ya requiere ser reemplazado. 
Edgar espera que de esta manera pueda generar mejor atención a sus clientes, pues podrá ofrecer bebidas frías que hace un tiempo tuvo que dejar de ofrecer. Además, Edgar espera que con ingresos extras pueda ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Edgar is an individual who has had to go through a great deal of adversity in his life. However, his desire to succeed has allowed him to overcome difficulties and continue moving forward with his family. Edgar is a single parent with three children, as the children's mother abandoned them some time ago.  

Because he had to start generating greater income to be able to support the household expenses, Edgar decided to set up his business, where he sells drinks and alcoloholic beverages to his customers. 

Edgar had a time with many crises, as his town fell under the influence of armed groups, which for a long time made his sales very low. Thanks to his fortitude, he was able to get through that difficult time, and now he continues to run his business and generate the income he needs for his household. 

Because the refrigerator where he stores his business's drinks is in a condition where it needs to be replaced, Edgar is seeking a loan that will offer him the chance to purchase a refrigerator for storing his drinks, because the refrigerator he has now needs to be replaced.

Edgar hopes that in this way he can serve his customers better, as he will be able to offer cold drinks, that he had to stop selling some time ago.

In addition, Edgar hopes that with the extra income, he can offer his family a better quality of life and greater opportunities for progress.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator for storing his drinks, because the refrigerator he has now needs to be replaced.

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор любящая мать,имеет 3 детей.Из за неблагоприятных условий в районах,она не могла получить соответствующее образование,поэтому она нигде не работает.Чтобы хоть как то улучшить условия жизни,она дома занимается откормом скота. Ее муж уехал со своими братьями в Россию на заработки, и каждый месяц присылает деньги, но заработанные деньги они тратят только на нужды первой необходимости.  Она попросила брата, что бы он помогал ей в купле продажи скота. Гулбахор сама ухаживает за скотом а  дети помогают при покупке корма. Она хочет увеличить поголовья скота, для этого ей необходимы деньги, поэтому она обратилась к нам за поддержкой.
texts.en: Gulbahor is a loving mother of 3 children. Due to adverse conditions in rural areas, she was unable to receive proper education and so is unemployed. In order to somehow improve her living conditions, she raises livestock at home. Gulbahor's husband has left with his brothers to find work in Russia and sends money every month, but this is only sufficient for bare necessities. Gulbahor has asked her brother to help her with the purchase and resale of livestock. She tends to the animals herself, while her children help when purchasing fodder. Gulbahor would like to increase the size of her herd, and so has turned to MDO Arvand, LLC for support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Gavhar

texts.ru: Гавхар кредитуется в Арванде с 2006 года. Она торгует конфетами и кондитерскими изделиями.Гавхар имеет клиентов не только с Таджикистана, но также есть клиенты с Киргизии, среди них есть постоянные клиенты. Она торгует на рынке около 15 лет. Раньше в бизнесе помогал муж, но к великому сожалению  месяц назад ее мужа скончался.В связи с этим   она почти 2 недели не выходила на рынок. Не смотря на своё горе  Гавхар необходимо продолжить реализацию своего товара. Недавно она построила  небольшой ларек, где будет торговать в холодное время года, для этого она получила кредит, чтобы расплатиться за постройку нового ларька.
texts.en: Gavhar has been receiving loans from Arvande since 2006. She sells candy and cookies and has clients not only from Tajikistan, but from Kyrgyzstan as well, many of them regulars. Gavhar has been selling sweets for more then 15 years. Her husband used to help her manage the business, but he has passed away recently. Due to her husbands death Gavhar didn't come to the market for two weeks. But despite her grief, she has to continue managing her business. Recently she built a new market stall where she can sell candy during the winter. Gavhar's loan was taken out to pay for the construction of the stall.

loans.use: for expansion of place of business

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia Bibi is 27 years old.  She is married and has three children. All of them are enrolled in local school and are getting their education.

Razia sews clothes for her community clients. She has a great love for her work and uses her creativity in sewing beautiful clothes. Due to her good quality work, she receives regular orders every month.

Razia has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s plastic bag-making business. He uses plastic beans in making plastic bags, which he sells to different shops in the market.

With the help of loan, he will buy plastic beans in bulk quantity, which will allow him to make a larger quantity of plastic bags, increasing his sales and profits.  He has been operating his business for many years and Razia is confident about his business success after investing the loan.

loans.use: To buy plastic beans for her husband's business making plastic bags.

loans.name: Pulat

texts.ru: Более 4 лет Пулат занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. Он целеустремленный и трудолюбивый юноша. Имеет собственный магазин. В бизнесе помогает сестра. Пулат хотел бы получить займ для покупки продуктов питания с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу доброту и помощь. Спасибо!
texts.en: Pulat has been selling food for over 4 years. He is a dedicated and hard-working young man. Pulat has his own store, and his sister helps him with the business. Pulat would like to receive a loan to purchase more products in order to expand his business. He is hoping for your kindness and help. Thank you!

loans.use: to buy food products in order to expand his business

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru: Рахмонова Мунира  1972 года рождения, замужем  у нее есть двойня и одна дочь вышла замуж. Она работает продавщицей в ковровом магазине уже 4 года. Первый кредит получила для   покупки холодильника, все кредиты, которые она получала у нас использовала для улучшения условия своего дома. Ее муж тоже работает в этом же магазине, охранником.В связи с ухудшением здоровья Мунира решила приобрести кредит. За финансовую поддержку она благодарна  Арванду.
texts.en: Munira was born in 1972, she is married and a mother of twins. One of her daughters is married. Munira has worked as a sales woman at a rug store for four years. Her husband also works at the store as a guard. She took out her first loan to purchase a fridge and has used all the other credits to perform home improvements. Due to her failing health Munira has asked for another loan. She is very grateful for financial assistance from Arvandu.

loans.use: to finance medical expenses

loans.name: Thou

texts.en:
Thou (pictured here), age 29, is a widow with one young daughter. She lives with her parents in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. Her mother stays at home and her father is a horse cart driver. 

Thou is a garment worker. She is requesting her first loan of $1,000 to replace the walls and wooden stilts of her house, because they are old and break.

loans.use: To replace the old walls and wooden stilts of her house.

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлюда  43 года, любящая мать 4 детей.  Она получает первый кредит в нашей организации. Получает кредит  для увеличения поголовья скота. Живет она с родителями мужа, планирует построить  свой дом, так как растут у них дети и им пора отделяться. Для этого ей необходимо увеличить свой капитал. В бизнесе помогает муж, поддерживает всячески, разводить и перепродавать  скот. Также она торгует молоком и молочными продуктами. Ее клиенты это соседи, знакомые и родственники. Она благодарна за поддержку от КИВА, также благодарна. что может  улучшить свои условия проживания.
texts.en: Mavluda is 43 years old and a loving mother of four children. She is taking out a loan from Kiva for the first time. Mavluda is planning to use the loan to purchase more livestock for her herd. She currently lives with her husband's parents but is planning to build their own house as her children are growing up and it's time to live as separate families. In order to finance the purchase of a house Mavluda needs to save money. Mavluda's husband also helps with the livestock business as best as he can - he raises and sells livestock with her. Mavluda also sells milk and dairy products on the market. Her clients are her neighbors, acquaintances and relatives. She is very grateful for Kiva's support and hopeful that she will be able to improve her living conditions with this loan.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Дилбар замужем, имеет 3 детей. Она с мужем с 2007 года занимались откормом скота. Муж сезонно ездит в Российскую Федерацию, и каждый раз присылает деньги ей. Дилбар ни где не работает, поэтому у нее есть время ухаживать за скотом, продавать молоко и молочные продукты, а также продавать шерсть коз. Так она поддерживает прибыльность своего хозяйства. В настоящий момент ей необходимо прикупить скот, для этого она получает кредит  в "Арванде"
texts.en: Dilbar is married and has three children. She has been raising livestock with her husband since 2007. Her husband also seasonally leaves to work in the Russian Federation and always sends money back home. Dilbar does not work anywhere, but she takes care of livestock and sells milk and dairy products as well as goat wool. Wool and dairy sales allow her to keep her business profitable. Currently she needs to purchase more animals for her herd and has turned to Kiva for a loan.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Sarom

texts.en:
Sarom and her husband live in a village about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 2002 and have two daughters.

Sarom is a lotus farmer who transports her crop to sell at the market. Her husband, Voeun, is a fisherman and assists his wife in her farming. In addition, the couple also raise fish at home to sell.

In the past Sarom had taken a loan through Kiva to purchase a motorbike. However, she was only able to afford a secondhand motorbike that was old and didn’t work well, so Sarom sold it. She is now asking for another loan to add to her proceeds from selling her old motorbike in order to purchase a new one. She will also use a part of the loan to buy fish feed.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike and fish feed.

loans.name: Manuchehr

texts.ru: Манучехр трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. С детство вместе с отцом он занимался откармливанием скота, и ему было интересно заниматься этим. Когда он вырос он сам начал заниматься купле- продажей скота. Манучехр запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Manuchehr is a hard-working and conscientious person. He is married and a responsible father of three children. His wife takes care of the household. Since childhood, Manuchehr has been taking care of livestock with his father and has always enjoyed it. When he grew up, Manuchehr started raising farm animals on his own. He is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase livestock and expand his business.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Sokhon

texts.en:
Sokhon (in the photo) is 60 years old and sells grocery items. Her husband stays at home. She lives in a village about thirty-five kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has three sons and two daughters. Three are married and live outside the family home, and the others are garment workers. 

Sokhon is asking for a loan of $1,000 to repair her house and build an addition onto it. She will also use a part of the loan to buy additional grocery items for resale.

loans.use: To repair her house and build an addition to it, and to buy additional grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Sangvat

texts.en:
Sangvat (in the photo), age 27, is a house builder. His wife, Tevy, age 22, sells vegetables. She buys vegetables under contract from farmers in her village and sells them in Phnom Penh market. Sangvat is asking for his first loan in the amount of $800 to help his wife’s vegetable-selling business by buying additional vegetables for resale. He will also use a part of the loan to repair the house where he lives. 

Sangvat and his wife have been married since 2007 and they just have one young daughter. The family lives on an island in the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

loans.use: To help his wife’s business selling vegetables by buying additional vegetables for resale, and also repair the house where he lives.

loans.name: Chinda

texts.en:
Chinda (in the photo), age 50, is a weaver, and her husband, Sao, age 52, raises cows at home. They live on an island in the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City, and they have two sons and four daughters. Two of their children are married and live outside the family home, three are garment workers, and another one stays at home.  

Chinda is asking for a loan in the amount of $500 to improve her house by laying and plastering the brick floor and the wall, in order to visually enhance it.

loans.use: To lay and plaster the brick floor and the wall of her house.

loans.name: Roth

texts.en:
Roth (pictured with his sister), age 29, is single and lives with his widower father and sister in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. His father is a farmer. 

Roth is a fisherman. He is applying for his first loan in the amount of $500 to purchase a boat and more fishing nets and to repair the house where he lives.

loans.use: to purchase a boat and more fishing nets and to repair the house where he lives.

loans.name: Muhiddin

texts.ru: Мухиддину 22 года, он женат имеет сына. Он  занимается откормом скота.У него есть несколько коров.Его жена домохозяйка.Так как некоторые коровы дойные ,чтобы хоть как то помочь мужу она  продает молоко и молочные продукты.Мухиддин не ограничивается только откормом скота в свое  свободное время он делает ремонты помещений в городе по заказу.Его мечта достойно вырастить сына,дать ему хорошее образование.Он живет со своими родителями.Его отец уехал в Россию на заработки и по мере возможности присылает им деньги.
texts.en: Muhiddin is 22 years old, married, and has a son. He raises livestock and currently keeps several cows. Muhiddin's wife take care of the household and, since some of the cows give milk, she tries to help her husband by selling milk and dairy products. Muhiddin does not limit himself to raising livestock, and during his free time performs indoor repairs in the city on request. His dream is to properly raise his son and to give him a good education. Muhiddin lives with his parents. His father has gone to Russia to find work, and sends money when possible.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Narmirat

texts.ru: Нармират женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Более 7 лет он занимается выращиванием и продажей сельхозпродукции. Полученный урожай он продает оптом. В бизнесе помогают старшие дети. Нармират запрашивает займ в размере 2000 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов. Нармират надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Namirat is married and a responsible father of three children. He is a hardworking and conscientious man. Namirat has been farming for seven years and sells his harvest wholesale to distributors. His older children help him with the farm. Namirat is requesting a loan of 2000 somoni to purchase fertilizer and fuel for the planting season. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizer, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Mukhabat

texts.ru: Мухабат 45 лет, замужем и имеет  двух детей. Мухабат работает в кафе и в качестве дополнительного источника финансирования для своей семьи, в 2008 году Мухабат начала свой бизнес в животноводстве с покупки скота на сумму в 50,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Мухабат, на сегодня ее хозяйство приносит примерно 8,000 сом с продажи молочных и мясных продуктов.  Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Мухабат обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Доходы Мухабат планирует вложить в оплату контракта на учебу для своей дочери.
texts.en: Mukhabat is 45 years old, married and has two children. She works in a cafe and also raises livestock to supplement her salary. Mukhabat started her livestock business in 2008 using 50,000 som(KGS). Her hard work has allowed her business to expand and now Mukhabat makes 8,000 som(KGS) monthly from milk and dairy sales. To further improve her business Mukhabat has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 40,000 som(KGS) to purchase sheep. She is planning to use the profits from this loan to pay for her daughter's education.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Somreang

texts.en:
Somreang is a weaver. She is a widow with five sons and two daughters. Three are married, one is a motorcycle repairman, one sells grocery items, one is a weaver, and one is a garment factory worker. They live on an island in the Mekong River, about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh. 

Somreang has asked for a Kiva loan to help with her daughter’s grocery store by purchasing more grocery items. She wants to continue expanding her grocery store.

loans.use: To invest in her daughter's business by purchasing more grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Duo Elim Group

texts.es:
DUO ELIM,
Este dúo está formado por doña Marta Olivia, de 27 años de edad, tiene 1 hija de 5 años, ella es casada y se dedica a la venta de ropa típica y también vende pollo dorado y papas fritas desde hace 8 años, nos cuenta que solicita este crédito para la venta de ropa típica ya que la época escolar empezó y quiere comprar blusas para venderlas además también quiere invertir en su negocio de papas fritas ya que quiere cambiar de estufa ya que la que tiene está un poco viejita entonces quiere mandarle a hacerle unos arreglos y así seguir vendiendo porque ella es la única en su sector que tiene ese tipo de negocio entonces la gente los fines de semana ya la conocen entonces llegan y le compran, también esta doña Lidia del rosario, de 29 años de edad, ella tiene 2 hijos que están estudiando en la primaria, ella vende ropa típica nueva y usada también hace delantales desde hace 7 años, nos cuenta que por allí donde ella vive en su sector, ella hace diferentes costuras que las personas llegan a solicitarles, también ahora ha empezado a elaborar bolsas típicas, para que las mujeres lleven sus cosas, nos cuenta que Gracias a Dios se le han vendido pero necesita comprar material (retazos de güipiles y cortes, ) para la elaboración de las mismas y para ello está solicitando este nuevo crédito. Las dos señoras están confiadas de que fape les pueda seguir apoyando en lo que están solicitando.
texts.en:
DUO ELIM: this duo is formed by Marta Olivia, 27 years old. She has one daughter who is 5 years old. She is married and works selling traditional clothing and also sells fried chicken and french fries. She has done this for 8 years. She tells us that she is requesting this loan to sell traditional clothing because the school year started and she wants to buy blouses to sell them. Furthermore, she also wants to invest in her french fries business because she wants to change the stove since the one she has is a little old. So she wants to send it to be repaired so she can continue selling because she is the only one in her sector who has this type of business. So on the weekends the people already know her and they come and they buy from her.

There is also Lidia del Rosario, she is 29 years old. She has two children in elementary school. She sells new and used traditional clothing and she also makes aprons. She has done this for 7 years. She tells us that in her sector where she lives she makes different types of needlework and people come to ask for them. Also now she has started to make traditional bags, so women can carry their things. She tells us that thanks to God they have been sold, but she needs to buy material (scraps of tunics and shorts) to make them and in order to do that she is requesting this new loan. The two women are confident that FAPE can continue supporting them in what they are asking.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing to sell.

loans.name: Komla

texts.fr:
Komla est un homme âgé de 35 ans. Il est marié à une revendeuse.
Komla travaille comme revendeur de friperie depuis 2000. Il vend de façon ambulante et achète au port Autonome de Lomé.
Komla a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter de friperies(pantalons, chemises et autres). Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer un avenir radieux à sa famille.
texts.en:
Komla is a 35-year-old man.  He is married to a reseller.

He has been reselling second-hand clothes since 2000.  He buys his merchandise at the Autonomous Port of Lomé and  resells it door-to-door.

He has requested his first loan from WAGES in order to buy second-hand clothes (pants, shirts etc...).  He wants to reinvest in his activity and provide a bright future for his family.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes (shirts, pants..)

loans.name: Srors

texts.en:
Srors (pictured above) sells grocery items at home. Her husband, Phoem, is a motor taxi driver. They live in a village in a suburb of Phnom Penh City.

Srors asked for a Kiva loan to repair and renovate the house where she lives. She has now completed that project and wants to repair the kitchen where she cooks, so she has decided to apply for another loan in order to make the repairs.

loans.use: To repair the kitchen where she cooks.

loans.name: Amneh

texts.en:
Amneh is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her son Montaser appears in her Kiva profile photo. Amneh is a 49-year-old woman, a mother with seven sons and two daughters. One of her sons is a worker and another son is a municipality employee; both are getting low salaries, which are not enough to cover the family's costs and the medical expenses. 

Amneh is requesting a loan from FATEN to help her cover the medical expenses for one of her sons, who is suffering from a disease and needs urgent treatment. This will improve Amneh's son's health and allow him to live with the family in better conditions.

loans.use: To pay for her son's medical expenses.

loans.name: Sokan

texts.en:
Sokan is 44 years old and her husband, Theng, is 50. They live on an island in the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City and have five children--four sons and one daughter. One has full-time employment, one is a weaver, and the others attend school.   

Sokan stays at home and does housework. The main source of income is her husband’s salary.  He is a policeman. Sokan is applying for a loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for her husband to get work.   

Photo: Sokan is standing next to the motorcycle which she wanted to buy. She bought it, but she has not paid for it yet. She asks for the loan to pay for the purchase.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike for her husband to get work.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of bananas to sell.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is 40 years old and married with two children. She sells blankets and bedsheets to earn a living. She has been in this business for 10 years and has employed one person. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to educate her children and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy blankets and bedsheets for sell.

loans.use: To buy blankets and bedsheets for sale.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en: Caroline is 26 years old and married with two children. She runs a retail shop to earn a living. She has been in this business for three years and has employed one person. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to grow her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 80,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar, cooking oil, baking powder, and wheat flour to sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar, cooking oil, baking powder, and wheat flour for sale.

loans.name: Dolreen

texts.en: Dolreen is 33 years old and married with two children. She does dairy farming to earn a living. She has been in the business for five years and has employed two people. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a dairy cow and feed.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow and feed.

loans.name: 13006 Abadahemuka Group

texts.en:
Clementine is 34 years old and married with two children between the ages of 3 and 5 years old. Her business is well organized. In her small shop she sells fruits and vegetables, etc. 

Clementine works from 6 am until 8 pm every day and has five years of experience. She is the president of this group which is called "13006 Abadahemuka" in the local language. In the photo, she is the first person from the right. 

Clementine has requested a loan from Kiva lenders through Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more fruits and vegetables to sell. With the profits from the loan, she will be able to build her own house and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To purchase more fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Inshirah

texts.en: Inshirah, 47 years old, is a divorced woman. For four years, Inshirah has been making embroidered traditional dresses to sell so she can afford her living expenses. Now Inshirah has applied for a loan to buy more sewing threads.

loans.use: to buy more sewing thread

loans.name: Afaf

texts.en:
Afaf, 39 years old, is a single lady who lives with her parents.

For six years, Afaf has been working in animal sales. She has a good number of sheep in her barn and she wants to have more. She also wants to buy sheep feed and work on improving the barn. For that reason, she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to buy sheep feed and more sheep

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mobile phones and accessories for resale.

loans.name: Hernan De Jesus

texts.es:
Hernan se ha dedicado a la actividad de la agricultura desde que tenía 15 años de edad, gracias a que su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y así aprendió el oficio de llevar un cultivo. Hernan se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo de 9 años de edad, a quien siempre le ha querido ofrecer una buena educación y una mejor calidad de vida. Gracias a sus cultivos, Hernan ha podido sacar a su familia adelante, y esto le ha permitido al mismo tiempo cumplir los sueños de su familia. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, Hernan tiene muy buen número de clientes, los que le garantizan unas buenas ventas mensuales. Con el ánimo de sacar adelante su cultivo, Hernan busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos para su cultivo como abonos, riegos, insecticidas, plásticos de invernadero, entre otros.
Hernan espera que de esta manera sus cultivos puedan salir de buena calidad y poderlos vender a un buen precio, además que de esta manera podrá generar mayores ingresos para su hogar con los cuales les podrá mejorar la calidad de vida a su esposa y a su hijo y les ofrecerá mayores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Hernan has farmed since he was 15 years old, thanks to the fact that his father had the same livelihood. This is how he learned the skills involved in raising crops.

Hernan is married and the father of a nine-year-old son, to whom he has always wanted to offer a good education and a better quality of life. Thanks to his crops, Hernan has been able to raise his family, and at the same time this has allowed him to fulfill his family's dreams. 

Thanks to the good quality of his products, Hernan has a very good number of customers, which guarantees him good monthly sales. With the intention of getting his crop started, Hernan is seeking a loan that will give him the chance to purchase agricultural supplies for his crop, such as fertilizers, irrigation supplies, insecticides, greenhouse plastic sheeting, and other things. 

Hernan hopes that in this way, his crops will turn out to be good quality, and that he will be able to sell them at a good price. In addition, he hopes that in this way, he will be able to generate greater income for his household, with which he will be able to improve the quality of life for his wife and son, and offer them greater opportunities for progress.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies for growing his crops, such as fertilizers, irrigation equipment, greenhouse plastic sheeting, and other things.

loans.name: Saeed

texts.en:
Saeed is a 50-year-old married man from Irbid, Jordan and a father of two children.

Saeed is looking to improve his family's living conditions. Thus, he is requesting a loan of 1300 JD to purchase new furniture for his home with an aspiration of improving his house and expanding it.

loans.use: to purchase home furniture

loans.name: Wycliff

texts.en: Wycliff is 29 years old and married with one child. He sells phone chargers and batteries to earn a living. He has been in this business for two years and has employed one person. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy phone chargers and batteries for sale.

loans.use: To buy phone chargers and batteries to sell.

loans.name: Nidal

texts.en:
Nidal is a 49-year-old man. He is married with eight sons. For the past 13 years, Nidal has run a cafe which offers hot drinks like tea and coffee, in addition to a pool table to entertain customers. This has been a profitable project, but not enough to cover all the family's costs.

Nidal is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing new chairs and tables and another pool table in order to improve the cafe's condition. This will be more attractive to customers and therefore increase sales and improve the family's income.

Nidal is pictured in his cafe.

loans.use: To purchase new chairs and tables and an additional pool table for his cafe.

loans.name: Rahme

texts.en:
Rahme is a conservative person who is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. Thus, the man in the photo is her husband.
Rahme is a 52-year-old married woman from Madaba, Jordan and a mother of three children.
Rahme is looking to improve her house so she is requesting a loan of 400 JD to do maintenance on it.
Rahme is looking to improve her family's living conditions and increase their living standards.

loans.use: to do maintenance for her house

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en: Anthony is a businessman. He sells food such as tea and loaves of bread to earn a living. He has been in this business for three years and has employed two people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy cooking oil, tea leaves, sugar, and milk.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, tea leaves, sugar, and milk.

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es:
Zoila, de 51 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, además es amable y sociable sabiendo ganarse el aprecio de las personas con su carisma. Es conviviente con Manuel quien es jubilado y padre de sus 3 hijos Niki, Ray y Jaqueline de 19,17 y 15 años de edad respectivamente. Juntos habitan cómodamente en su propia casa que construyeron con sus esfuerzos. La actividad que realiza Zoila es la costura oficio que aprendió estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional de joven, pero al cual no se dedicaba sino hace más de 10 que retomó recién su oficio. Iniciándose con una máquina y en la actualidad cuenta con más de 6 máquinas de coser para diferentes acabados brindando trabajos bien realizados a sus clientes que salen satisfechos y la recomiendan con otras personas. También vende ropas que compra en la capital o que ella elabora, teniendo en su negocio un espacio donde exhibe sus productos.
Estas actividades las realiza desde su casa, a donde llegan sus clientes y los atiende amablemente.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le deja y la demanda que tiene sus productos, y hasta el momento lo viene realizando sola, pero en ocasiones le apoya su hija que está aprendiendo a coser.
De decidió a empezar con su actividad  ya que dejo su empleo y necesitaba de un oficio para generase sus ingresos económicos, además de la solicitud de sus vecinas al ver sus buenos acabados en la costura. 
Pero ya por edad le resulta algo cansado estar en una misma postura para coser, por eso con las ganancias desea invertir en una bodega de abarrotes. Este será el préstamo número 16 con la institución MFP. Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues conoce a sus integrantes y los considera ser personas buenas y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de costura como telas, hilos, elásticos y otros, todos estos materiales piensa traer desde la capital buscando precios más cómodos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en: Zoila, 51-years of age, is a diligent and hard-working woman with many desires to do well.  She is also a kind and sociable person who knows how to win the appreciation of the people with her charisma.  She lives with Manuel who is retired and the father of her 3 children, Niki, Ray and Jaqueline, at 19, 17 and 15 years of age respectively.  Together they live in their own house that they built with their efforts.  The activity that Zoila performs is dressmaking, an occupation that she learned by studying at a center for youth employment education, but which she did not at first pursue.  More than 10 years ago she took up dressmaking again.  Starting with one machine, she currently relies on more than 6 sewing machines for different finishes, offering quality work to her clients that leave satisfied and recommend her to other people.  She also sells clothes that she buys in the capital or that she makes, having in her business a space where she exhibits her products.  She carries out her work in her house, where her clients come and she attends them kindly.  She considers her business quite profitable due to the profits that she earns and the demand for her products.  Up to now she has worked alone, except from time to time when she supports her daughter who is learning to sew.  She decided to begin with this activity when she lost her job and needed a position to generate an income, besides which her neighbors requested her work when they saw her fine finished clothing.  Her age begins to cause her to tire when she is sewing in the same position all day, therefore she wants to invest the profits in a convenience store.  This will be her 16th loan with MFP.  She hopes for a small loan so that she can pursue her objectives.  On the other hand, she tells us that she is comfortable with her communal bank where she knows the members and considers them to be supportive and good people.  With the requested total of 1500 new soles she will invest in dressmaking materials such as fabric, thread, elastic and other such things.  She plans to purchase all these materials at a better price by buying in bulk.

loans.use: to buy dressmaking supplies such as fabric, thread, and elastic.

loans.name: Elio

texts.es:
Elio, de 47 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y con muchas ganas de progresar, además de amable y cordial con las personas. Es conviviente con Iris quien es ama de casa y madre de sus 2 hijos Rosmery y Rodrigo de 3 y 1 años de edad respectivamente. Juntos habitan cómodamente su propia casa que compraron con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza Elio es la venta de productos variados como ferretería, ropas, pasamanería, perfumería y abarrotes, todos estos productos los exhibe en una bodega que tiene en su casa, donde atiende muy amablemente  a sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus vecinos.
Se inició hace más de 4 años con un préstamo de MFP más un capital propio, comprando en pequeñas cantidades, viendo la acogida que tenía su negocio se decidió continuar y hasta el momento lo realiza con el apoyo de su pareja en la atención. Considera su negocio rentable por las ganancias que le deja, pues le permite mantener a su familia y reinvertir en su negocio, además por la acogida que sigue teniendo sus productos.
Decidió empezar con su negocio por la necesidad de contar con un oficio y tener ingresos económicos para mantener a su familia, y en un futuro desea convertirse en un próspero empresario.
Por tanto y viendo los resultados que sigue teniendo, desea aumentar el stock de sus productos y ver crecer sus negocio. Este será el préstamo número 14 con la institución MFP. Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes.  Por otro lado comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues considera a sus integrantes ser personas amables y solidarias. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de mercadería para su negocio como clavos por cajas, pañales de niños, abarrotes en general, mangueras, tubos, focos y otros, buscando precios bajos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en: Elio, 47-year-old, is an industrious man with many desires to progress, besides being kind and cordial with people.  He lives with Iris who is a housewife and the mother of his 2 children,  Rosemary and Rodrigo,  3 and 1 years of age respectively.  Together they live in their own house that they bought with a lot of effort.  The activity that Elio carries out is the sale of various products such as hardware, clothes, trims, perfume and groceries.  He exhibits all these products in a convenience store that he has in his house, where he very kindly attends his clients who are mostly his neighbors.  He started his business over 4 years ago with a loan from MFP and his own capital, buying in small quantities.  Seeing the reception that his business had, he decided to continue and until now has tended the store with the support of his wife.  He considers it a profitable business because of the profit that it earns, which permits him to maintain his family and to reinvest in his business, as well as the reception that his products continue to have.  He decided to begin his business because he needed work and to have an income to maintain his family.  In the future he wants to become a prosperous businessman.  For this and seeing the results that he continues having, he desires to enlarge his stock of products and to see his business grow.  This will be his 14th loan with MFP.  With the loan he hopes to pursue his plans.  On the other hand he tells us he is comfortable with his communal bank where he considers its members to be supportive and kind people.  With the requested total of 2000 new soles, he will invest in the purchase of merchandise for his business such as boxes of nails, diapers for children, groceries, hoses, pipes, light bulbs and other things, seeking low prices by making his purchases in volume.

loans.use: to buy boxes of nails, childrens diapers, general groceries, hoses, pipes, lightbulbs

loans.name: Wolframio

texts.es: Wolframio, de 32 años; vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Gladys de 30 años y sus dos queridos hijos; Nonfry de 05 años y Maryori de 02 años a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Su actividad es laborar como obrero de agricultura para la municipalidad de su localidad. Wolframio, tiene mucho conocimiento sobre el cultivo de plantas de cacao, café y entre otras plantas; gracias a ello los ingenieros del municipio le contrataron para que pueda ver los viveros  que producen; y ser vendidas a los mismos campesinos de su localidad. De la misma forma   Wolframio y su pareja se dedican  a arrendar cacao (alquilar plantas con frutos para ser cosechadas), de esta manera lo llevan a vender a los centros de acopio de su localidad; es ahí donde ganan muy bien por cada kilogramo y así recuperan el dinero de lo que gastan en arrendar. Con el tiempo piensa en sembrar plantas de cacao en sus campos de cultivo. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP; por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar con sus planes. Asimismo se compromete a ser muy puntual con sus cuotas de pago. Con el crédito solicitado comprará plantas de cacao para sembrar en su chacra y con la otra parte arrendará plantas de cacao.
texts.en: Wolframio, age 32, lives in his own house together with his partner Gladys, age 30, and his two beloved children, Nonfry, age 5, and Maryori, age 2, for whom he would like to provide a better quality of life. His work is serving as an agricultural worker for the local municipality. Wolframio knows a lot about the cultivation of cacao and coffee plants, among other kinds of plants. Thanks to this, the engineers of the municipality have contracted him to look at the nursery plants that are produced and sold to the farmers of his area. At the same time, Wolframio and his partner work renting cacao (renting plants with fruits that can be harvested), and they take their harvest to sell at the wholesale centers of his town. There, they earn a good profit on each kilogram and recover the money they spend on renting. Over time, he is thinking of planting cacao plants on his cultivated fields. This will be his first loan with MFP, and he hopes for your support so that he can carry out his plans. Accordingly, he is committed to being very punctual with his payments. With the loan he has requested, he will buy cacao plants to plant on his farm, and with the other part he will rent cacao plants.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants and also to rent cacao plants to harvest the production.

loans.name: Kelly

texts.es:
Kelly, de 45 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además es muy atenta y amable con las personas. Es separada del padre de sus quienes ya son mayores e independientes. Vive en su propia casa en compañía de uno de sus hijos Winston de 10 años de edad a quien educa y se esfuerza en sacar adelante.
La actividad que realiza Kelly es la venta de ropas de primer uso, de buena calidad y modelos varados que están a la moda, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños. Todos estos productos son adquiridos en sus viajes a la capital y los vende desde la casa de su sobrina, ofreciendo también a sus vecinas y amistades a quienes trata de manera amable y cordial, ganándose sus preferencias y estos la recomiendan con otras personas.
Se inició hace más de 3 años con un capital prestado de MFP, y hasta el momento lo viene realizando en sociedad con su sobrina quien le ayuda buscar nuevos clientes.
Considera a su negocio rentable por las ganancias que le deja, y le sirven para solventar su gastos y la educación de su hijo.
Se decido a empezar con su negocio por la necesidad de contar con un ingreso económico para solventar sus gastos ya que le faltaba para cubrir sus necesidades.
Por tanto, viendo las ganancias que le deja, desea invertir en la venta de jugos de frutas por las mañanas, así aumentara sus ingresos. Este será le préstamo número 18 con la institución MFP.  Por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, nos comenta que le gusta el trabajo de su banco comunal por el apoyo que viene  brindando a las personas que lo necesitan.
Con el monto solicitado de 3000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de ropas variadas, y golosinas para vender en su casa.
texts.en: Kelly, a 45-year-old, is a diligent and hard-working woman, besides which she is very attentive and kind with people.  She is separated from the father of her children, who are already grown and independent.  She lives in her own house in the company of one of her children,  Winston, age  10, whom she educates and endeavors to move ahead.  The activity that Kelly carries out is the sale of new clothes of good quality and past styles that are fashionable for ladies, gentlemen and children.  All these products are acquired in her trips to the capital and she sells them in her neice’s house, offering also to her neighbors and friends who she treats in a cordial and kind manner, winning their favor and recommendation to other people.  She began her business over 3 years ago with a loan from MFP, and up to now she has worked in company with her niece who helps her to find new clients.  She considers her business profitable because of the profits that it earns which allow her to settle her expenses and pay for the education of her son.  She says that she began her business because she needed an income to settle her expenses, since she lacked enough to cover her needs.  Therefore, seeing the profits that she earns, she desires to invest in fruit juice to sell in the mornings, thus enlarging her income.  This will be her 18th loan with MFP.  The loan will allow her to continue with her objectives.  On the other hand, she tells us that she likes the work of her communal bank for the support that it offers to the people that need it.  With the requested total of 3000 new soles, she will invest in the purchase of various clothing, and snacks to sell from her house.

loans.use: to buy clothing and snacks.

loans.name: Najah

texts.en: Najah sells clothes and cosmetics and is requesting a loan of 600 Jordanian dinars to purchase greater quantities for trading purposes. She is a conservative woman, unwilling to have her picture uploaded on the internet. The man in the photo is her son. Najah is a 50-year-old married woman from Al Nasser, Amman, Jordan and the mother of six children. Najah is looking to establish a shop for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for trading purposes

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is 36 years old. She sells sweaters, blouses and trousers to earn a living. She has been in this business for 1 year and has employed one person. She describes her business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Christine has been able to grow her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sweaters, blouses and trousers to sell.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, blouses and trousers to sell.

loans.name: Felix

texts.en:
Felix is 34 years old and is married with two children. He has a motorcycle transport business to earn a living. He has been in this business for 6 years and has employed two people. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Felix has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for a loan of 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Ranya

texts.en:
Ranya is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Nihad appears in her Kiva profile photo, photographed in his metal shop.

Ranya is 31 years old and a mother with three sons and three daughters. Her husband has a car wash which earns a low income - not enough to cover the family's needs. For the past 5 years, Ranya's husband has also been working in buying, recycling and then selling scrap metal, which has been a profitable project and contributes to protect the environment.

Ranya is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing bulk scrap metal in order to recycle and resell. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase bulk scrap metal to recycle and resell again.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es:
Dora, de 58 años de edad, es una mujer luchadora y trabajadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, además de ser alegre y extrovertida. Está casada con Noé quien es docente y padre de sus hijos Alex, Carlos y Luis de 32, 30 y 28 años de  edad respectivamente. Juntos viven en su casa propia que compraron con sus ahorros de varios años. La actividad que realiza Dora es el alquiler de habitaciones y vivienda, para eso tiene un terreno donde construyó dos casas, una la tiene alquilada y la otra con pequeñas habitaciones para alquilar y tiene todos ocupado.
Se inició hace 3 años con una capital propio fruto de sus ahorros, que invirtió en su casa pensando en su futuro contando con el apoyo de sus hijos que le ayudan con la administración.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda que tiene pues todos sus curtos están ocupados, y es un trabajo descansado que no necesita mucho esfuerzo físico. De decidió a empezar su negocio viendo lo avanzado de su edad y la necesidad de contar con un ingreso propio para mantenerse ya que no podrá tener acceso a un empleo ni jubilación. Por tanto viendo la oportunidad de negocio, y las ganancias que está logrando se anima a invertir en la compra de otro terreno para construir un recreo turístico en un futuro. Este será el préstamo número 12 con la institución MFP. Está agradecida al saber que seguirá contando con el apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio. Además comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues conoce a sus integrantes y los considera ser personas responsables y amables. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de una bomba de agua valorizada en 1500 nuevos soles para brindar un buen servicio a sus inquilinos y tengan el servicio de agua permanente. Y con el saldo en los gastos de instalación.
texts.en: Dora, age 58, is a diligent and hard-working woman with many desires to do well, besides being happy and extroverted.  She is married to Noah who is a teacher and the father of her children, Alex, Carlos and Luis, ages 32, 30 and 28 respectively.  Together they live in their own house that they bought with their savings of many years.  The activity that Dora carries out is renting rooms and houses.  She has  land where she built two houses, one which is rented and the other with small rooms to rent, all occupied.  Her business was started 3 years ago with capital from her own savings, that she invested in their house thinking about their future including the support of their children that help her with the administration.
