She considers it a quite profitable business due to the demand and that all her room s are occupied, and that it is work that does not need a lot of physical effort.  She decided to begin her business seeing that she was getting advanced in age and had the need to earn her own income to live on since she would not have access to employment or retirement.  Seeing the opportunity for the business, and the profits that it is achieving she is encouraged to invest in the purchase of more land to build a tourist hotel in the future.  This will be her 12th loan with MFP.  She is grateful to know that she can continue to count on financial support to advance with her business.  Besides she tells us that she is comfortable with her communal bank where she knows its members and considers them to be kind and responsible people.  With the requested total of 2000 new soles she will invest in the purchase of a pump for water valued at 1500 new soles to offer good service to her boarders so they will have permanent water service.  With the balance she will pay for the expenses of installation.

loans.use: to install a well to have water all the time for her boarders.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy skirts, blouses and sweaters to sell

loans.name: Liz

texts.es:
Liz, de 32 años de edad, es una mujer que le gusta el trabajo y tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante, además de ser alegre y cordial en su trato con las personas. Es separada del padre de sus hijas Elizabeth y Rosoli de 14 y 10 años de edad respectivamente a quienes quiere mucho y son su motivación para seguir trabajando. Juntas están instaladas en la casa de sus padres en compañía de su mamá y su papá. La actividad que realiza Liz es la venta de productos de belleza como esmaltes, labiales, cremas faciales, perfumes y otros. Todos estos productos son adquiridos por catálogo y los vende entre sus vecinas, amigas y familiares a quienes atiende de manera amable y cordial logrando ganarse sus preferencias y que la recomienden con otras personas. 
También vende bebidas gaseosas, para esto cuenta con una refrigeradora donde guarda todos sus productos bien heladas al gusto de sus clientes, e iniciándose vendiendo frutas con un capital propio de a poco, luego paso a golosinas, y actualmente con las gaseosas. Ambos negocio atiende desde su casa.
Considera a sus negocios bastantes rentable por las ganancias que le deja y hasta el momento los viene realizando sola, pero en ocasiones le apoya su hija en la atención.
Se decidió a empezar con su negocio por la necesidad de contar con un ingreso económico que le ayudara a mantener a sus hijas pues recién se había separado de su padre.
Por tanto y viendo los buenos resultados que está teniendo, desea aumentar su stock de mercaderías para ver crecer sus negocios. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP. Se siente contenta y agradecida por el apoyo que recibirá para continuar con sus planes. Por otro lado, comenta gustarle el trabajo de su banco comunal por el apoyo que vienen brindando a las personas y por considerarlo un grupo solidario y responsable. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de mercerías como productos de belleza y bebidas gaseosas para tener un stock disponible para la venta, buscando conseguir precios cómodos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Liz, 32-year-old, is a woman that likes her work and has a desire to do well, besides being happy and cordial in her dealings with people.  She is separated from the father of her daughters, Elizabeth and Rosoli , ages 14 and 10 respectively, who she loves very much and who are her motivation to continue working.  Together they live in the house of her parents in the company of her mom and dad.  The activity that Liz carries out is selling beauty products such as nail polish, lipstick, facial creams, perfumes and other things.  All these products are acquired from a catalogue and she sells them to her neighbors, friends and family whom she attends in a kind and cordial manner managing to win their preference and recommendation to other people.  She also sells carbonated beverages and bottled water.  For this she relies on a refrigerator where she keeps all her products well chilled to the tastes of her clients.  She began selling fruits with her own capital, starting small, then stepping up to snacks and at present to carbonated beverages. She attends both businesses in her house.  
She considers her business quite profitable due to the profits that it earns.  Up to now she has worked alone, but from time to time her daughter tends it with her.   She decided to begin her business due to the need for an income to help to maintain her daughters, having recently been separated from their father.  Seeing the good results that she is having,  she wants to grow her stock of merchandise to see her business grow.  
This will be her 4th loan with MFP.  She is happy and thankful for the support that she will receive to continue with her plans.  On the other hand, she tells us that she likes the work of her communal bank because of the support that they offer people and considers it a responsible and supportive group.  With the requested total of 1000 new soles, she will invest in the purchase of merchandise such as beauty products and carbonated beverages to have an available stock for sale, seeking to obtain a good price by buying in bulk.

loans.use: To buy beauty products and carbonated drinks

loans.name: Isabella

texts.en: Isabella is 26 years old and married with three children. She sells motor vehicle spare parts to earn a living. She has been in the business for 10 years and describes her business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to improve her living conditions and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for a 20,000 Kenyan shilling loan to buy motor vehicle spare parts.

loans.use: to buy motor vehicle spare parts

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es: Lucy, de 40 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, además de ser alegre y cordial. Es conviviente con Wilquer quien se dedica al transporte y es padre de su hijo de 1 año de edad. Juntos viven en su propia casa que compraron con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza Lucy es la venta de diversas mercaderías como ropas de damas, caballeros y niños, también accesorios de plata como pulseras, collares y anillos. Todos estos productos los compran en Lima a través de su tía, y los vende desde su casa a sus amistades, familiares y vecinas, además de personas recomendadas. Tiene más de 6 años dedicándose a éste negocio y hasta el momento lo realiza ella sola. Le gusta su negocio por los ingresos económicos, el poder disponer de sus horarios de trabajo, y sentirse independiente, deseando convertirse en una prospera empresaria. Considera su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le deja. Por tanto, tiene planes continuar en su negocio y aumentar su stock de mercaderías, para hacer crecer su negocio. Este será el préstamo número 7 con la institución MFP. Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal, pues brindan un apoyo a las personas concediéndoles líneas de créditos. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de mercaderías como joyería de plata para tener un stock disponible para la venta, buscando precios más bajos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en: Lucy is 40 years old. She is a hard-working woman with a great desire to get ahead, as well as being cheerful and friendly. She lives together with Wilquer, who works in the field of transportation and is the father of her 1-year-old child. Together they live in their own house, which they purchased with great effort. Lucy's business is selling a range of merchandise such as clothing for men, women and children, as well as silver accessories such as bracelets, necklaces and rings. She buys all of these products in Lima through her aunt, and she sells them from her home to friends, family members and neighbors, in addition to people who are recommended to her. She has dedicated herself to this business for more than 6 years, and up to now she has done it by herself. She likes her business because of the income, the ability to set her working hours, and the feeling of independence, as she strives to become a prosperous business owner. She considers her business quite profitable because of the earnings it gives her. Thus, she plans to continue with her business and increase her stock of merchandise so her business will grow. This will be loan number 7 for her with the MFP institution. She hopes for your support so that she can carry out her plans. She also comments that she is happy with her communal bank, since they support people by providing lines of credit. With the requested amount of 2000 Peruvian new soles, she will invest in buying merchandise such as silver jewelry in order to have stock available to sell, looking for lower prices by purchasing in volume.

loans.use: to buy silver jewelry.

loans.name: Maria Perpetuo Socorro

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de salir adelante le han permitido superarlas y lograr salir adelante junto con su familia. Maria desde hace aproximadamente 1 año montó su negocio donde ofrece verdes y plátanos, y gracias a esto contribuye a la generación de ingresos para su hogar. La principal razón por la que decidió montar su negocio es debido a que su esposo se encuentra muy delicado de salud y ya no tiene las condiciones para poder seguir asistiendo a su empleo, es por esto que Maria ha quedado a cargo del sostenimiento de su hogar. Maria, debido a que inició su negocio con muy bajo capital, ofrece solo 2 productos en su tienda, lo que hace que a menudo sus ventas sean muy restringidas y su negocio no le genere los ingresos suficientes. Con el ánimo de generar mayores ventas en su negocio, Maria espera que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de verduras para ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos.
Maria espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá hacer su negocio más atractivo para sus clientes. Además, Maria espera que con mayores ingresos pueda mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, en especial la de su esposo que se encuentra muy delicado de salud.
texts.en:
Maria is a person who has had to go through a lot of adversity in her life. However, her desire to succeed has allowed her to overcome them, and has enabled her and her family to move forward.

Maria set up her business approximately one year ago, where she sells greens and plantains. Thanks to this she helps generate income for her household. The main reason she decided to set up her business is because her husband's health is very frail, and he is unable to continue going to work. 

This is why Maria has been left responsible for supporting her household.  Due to the fact she started her business with very little working capital, she only sells two products in her store, which means that frequently her sales are very limited, and her business does not generate enough income. 

With the intention of generating greater sales in her business, Maria hopes that a loan will give her the opportunity to purchase vegetables, in order to offer her customers a greater variety of produce.

Maria hopes that in this way her income will increase considerably, as she will be able to make her business more attractive for her customers. In addition, Maria hopes that with greater income, she will be able to improve her family's quality of life, especially that of her husband whose health is very frail.

loans.use: To buy vegetables in order to offer her customers a greater variety of produce.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria, de 27 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser alegre y amable con muchas ganas de progresar. Es conviviente con Andrés quien se dedica al transporte y es padre de sus 2 hijos de 12 y 4 años de edad. Juntos habitan su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Gloria es la venta de abarrotes de primera necesidad, para eso cuenta con bodega que abrió en su propia casa. Iniciándose con su propio capital y atendiendo de manera amable y cordial a sus clientes, ganándose su preferencia. Tiene más de 8 años dedicándose a éste negocio y hasta el momento cuenta con el apoyo de su pareja en la atención al público en sus ratos libres.
 Le gusta su negocio pues le genera ingresos económicos y puede estar en la comodidad de su hogar, contando con tiempo disponible para atender a sus hijos. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja. Por eso, tiene planes de incrementar su stock de productos y hacer crecer su bodega hasta convertirlo en un minimarket con una gran variedad de productos a la venta. Este será el préstamo número 5 con la institución MFP. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crédito que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado de 2500 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de mercadería como abarrotes en general, para así tener un stock disponible para la venta, buscando precios más bajos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Gloria is 27, and a very hard-working and determined woman, besides being cheerful, and eager to get ahead. She lives with her partner Andrés, who works in transportation and is the father of her two children, ages 12 and 4. They live together in their own house. 

Gloria sells grocery staples, and for that purpose has a small general store that she opened in her own home. Starting out with her own working capital, and serving her clients in a warm and friendly manner, she has earned their preference. She has been working in her business for more than eight years, and up to now she has had the support of her partner, who serves the public in his spare time. 

She likes her business because it generates income for her, and she can be in the comfort of her home, and have the time available to look after her children. She considers the business to be quite profitable, because of the good earnings it provides. That is why she has plans to increase her stock of products, and make her general store grow, until she converts it into a minimart selling a great variety of products.  

This will be her fifth loan with the MFP institution. She is very happy to know that she will have financial support, as in this way she will feel secure in moving forward with her business. Moreover, she promises to once again make her installment payments, as with the previous loans she had. In addition, she appreciates being part of her communal bank, because all the members are responsible and very supportive people.  

With the amount of 2,500 nuevos soles applied for, she will invest in the purchase of more merchandise such as groceries in general, in order to have stock available for sale, seeking lower prices because of her volume purchases.

loans.use: To buy basic household staples to sell.

loans.name: Pélargie

texts.fr:
Pélargie est une femme âgé(e) de 44 ans. Elle est mariée å un commerçant. Elle a 03 enfants. Pélargie travaille comme revendeuse de biscuits et de jus depuis 2007. Elle sert seule ses clients à domicile et achète les biscuits à Lomé et au Burkina Faso.
Pélargie a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des biscuits et bissap pour la vente.
texts.en: Pélargie is a 44-year-old woman.  She is married to a retailer and has three children.  She has been working as a cookie and juice reseller since 2007.    She buys cookies in Lomé and in Burkina Faso, and serves her customers alone, from her home.  Pélargie has requested a third loan from WAGES in order to buy cookies and hibiscus tea for resale.

loans.use: to buy cookies, bags of sugar, etc.

loans.name: Ketty

texts.es:
Ketty, de 30 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser alegre y cordial. Es conviviente con Richard quien es empleado y padre de sus 2 hijos de 10 y 4 años de edad, quienes son su mayor motivación. Juntos habitan su propia casa.
La actividad que realiza Ketty es la elaboración y venta de paneles de tablillas, que sirven para las divisiones interiores de casas y cualquier otro ambiente. Negocio que tienen en sociedad con su suegro y  cuenta con un taller en un local alquilado.  Tiene bastante clientela a quienes atienden de manera amable y cordial, además de elaborar sus productos a las medidas que le solicitan sus clientes. Tiene más de 7 años dedicándose a éste negocio y cuenta con el apoyo de su pareja en la búsqueda de nuevos clientes en sus ratos libres.
Le gusta su negocio por los ingresos económicos, el trabajar en sociedad con su suegro y el poder sentirse una prospera empresaria. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda y  las buenas ganancias que le deja. Por tanto tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y abrir un taller en su propia casa. 
Este será el préstamo número 03 con la institución MFP. Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además de sentirse bien con su banco comunal por el apoyo que brindan a las personas con líneas de créditos. 
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de su producto, que son tablillas buscando precios más bajos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Ketty is 30, she is a hardworking woman in addition to being joyful and nice.  She lives with Richard who is employed and is the father of their two children ages 10 and 4, they are their main motivation, together they live in a house they own.
Ketty's activity is the making and sale of wood panels, that are used to divide home interiors and other spaces. She has this business in partnership with her father in law and has a shop that they rent.  They have many clients that they serve in a joyful and helpful way, in addition they make the products custom to the specifications requested by their clients.  She has done this for more than 7 years, and is helped by her partner when looking for new clients during his free time.  She likes the income generated by her business as well as working with her father in law and be able to feel like a prosperous entrepreneur.  She considers her business to be profitable because of the demand and good earnings it generates.  Because of this she has plans to expand the business and open a shop in her house.  
This is her third loan with MFP. She hopes they will help her again so she can achieve her goals. She also feels happy with her community bank because of the support they give to people with credit lines.  With the loan requested of 1500 new soles, she will buy materials to make products, looking for lower prices on wood by buying wholesale.

loans.use: To buy materials to make wood panels for sale.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
Nelly, de 36 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora  y empeñosa, además es alegre y sociable. Es separada del padre de sus hijos. Vive en compañía de sus hijos de 10, 3 y 1 años de edad, y su hermana. Habitando cómodamente su propia casa.
La actividad que realizan es la venta de bebidas gaseosas, producto que compra en la distribuidora y lo vende desde su casa a sus vecinos y los transeúntes de la zona. Cuenta con una congeladora donde guarda a temperatura helada al gusto de sus clientes por el clima caluroso de la zona. Tiene más de 2 años dedicándose a este negocio y lo realiza ella sola.
Le gusta su negocio por los ingresos económicos, el  contar con una ocupación y sentirse una persona productiva, además de poder estar en la comodidad de su casa y cuidar de sus hijos quienes son su motivación. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le deja y la demanda que tiene sobre todo los días más calorosos. Por tanto, tiene planes de mantenerse y continuar con su negocio. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP. Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues lo considera un grupo unido y solidario.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de más bebidas gaseosas de diversas marcas y sabores, para tener un stock disponible para la venta, buscando precios más bajos por sus compras en volumen y al contado.
texts.en:
Nelly, 36, is an industrious and hardworking woman. She is also cheerful and friendly. She is separated from the father of her children. She lives comfortably in her own home with her children, ages 10, 3, and 1, and her sister. 

Her occupation is selling soft drinks, which she buys at the distributor and sells from her house to passer-bys in the area. She has a freezer that keeps the drinks freezing cold, just the way her customers like it in the hot climate of the area. She has two years of experience in this business and works alone. She likes the business because it allows her to earn an income. She also likes having a job and feeling like a productive person. In addition, she likes being in the comfort of her home where she can take care of her children, who are the source of her motivation. She considers her business to be worthwhile because she can earn an income and because there is a demand for her products, especially on the hottest days. She plans to keep on working at her business. This will be her 4th loan with MFP. She hopes that the collaboration will help her realize her plans. She says that she likes the communal bank because it is a united and caring group. 

With the 1500 Nuevos Soles (PEN) requested, Nelly will invest in more sodas of different brands and flavors, giving her a larger supply available for sale. The loan will also help her get lower prices by buying in bulk and paying in a single cash payment.

loans.use: buy more soda

loans.name: Marita

texts.es:
Marita, de 46 años, es una mujer buena y trabajadora, es conviviente con Cesar de 47 años, es madre de tres hijos a quienes crió y educo hasta brindarles la mayoría de edad y una profesión a cada uno de ellos. Ahora vive en su casa propia a lado de su pareja con quien trabaja mucho para así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. Todos los días, desde muy temprano, Marita se levanta hacer las cosas de su hogar, de ahí se dirige a un local ubicado en una parte céntrica y estratégica de la ciudad en donde abre y comienza a ofrecer la variedad de productos entre lubricantes y repuestos de vehículos de dos y tres ruedas. Durante los tres años que lleva realizando este trabajo, aprendió que al cliente siempre tiene que tratarle bien y sobre todo cuando no encuentra un repuesto en ese momento en su local ella se va en busca del mismo a la tienda del costado pues no quiere perder a sus clientes que le costo mucho poder ganárselos.
En su local solo trabajan tres personas incluyéndola, tiene la ayuda de una persona a quien contrata y a su hijo que se encarga de la parte mecánica de los vehículos, mientras que ella solo se encarga de vender y ofrecer los repuestos, le esta yendo muy bien, vende mucho y sobre todo siempre tiene ventas, esto le permitió obtener mejores ingresos y así mejorar su condición de vida. Ahora desea poder agrandar su negocio y empezar a vender repuestos originales y de diferentes marcas y modelos de vehículos. Este será el préstamo número 15 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles comprará mas mercadería para vender, entre las cosas que necesita están llantas, cámaras, aceites de motores, accesorios y mas, ya que esta comenzó con la expansión de su negocio.
texts.en:
Marita, 46 years old, is a good and hardworking person. She lives with Cesar, who is 47 years old. She is the mother of three children that she raised and educated until they were of age an each one of them has a profession. She now lives in her own house, along with her partner, with whom she works to assure a better quality of life. Every day, very early in the morning, Maria gets up early to do her housework. Then she goes to a store located in a central and strategic part of the city where she opens and begins selling a variety of products, including lubricants and replacement parts for two- and three-wheeled vehicles. During the three years that she has been doing this job, she has learned that customers must always be treated well, especially when the part they are looking for is not available at the moment in her store. She goes and looks for it in the store next door because she doesn’t want to lose the customers that were hard to get in the first place. 

Only three people work in her store, including herself. She has the help of a paid employee and also her son, who takes care of the mechanic work for the vehicles, while she takes care of selling the replacement parts. This is going very well for her. She sells a lot and she always has sales. This allows her to have improved income and thereby improve her quality of life. She now wants to expand her business and start to sell original parts and for different brands and models of vehicles. This will be her 15th loan with Microfinanzas Prisma, so she hopes for collaboration so she can continue with her goals. She also pledges again to make her repayments, as she did with the previous loans she’s had. Also, she is happy to be part of her communal bank because all of the members are people who are responsible and supportive. With the requested amount of 3,000 soles (PEN), she will buy more merchandise to sell, including tires, inner tubes, motor oils, accessories, and other items.

loans.use: to buy tires, inner tubes, motor oils, and accessories.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia, de 66 años, es una mujer amable, trabajadora y emprendedora, es madre de ocho hijos a quienes crió y educó durante mucho tiempo ella sola, ya que su esposo falleció hace ya bastante tiempo. Ella vive en su casa propia y tiene a su lado a dos de sus hijos con quienes compartes sus días de arduo trabajo para tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Delia consiste en la venta de bebidas, en su casa acondiciono un lugar en donde coloca sus diversos bebidas en tamaños y presentaciones que ofrece a sus clientes. Entre las bebidas que vende tiene gaseosas de diversas marcas, además de cervezas. Tiene un negocio adicional el cual es la venta de gas de consumo domestico. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por 2 años y lo hace sola.
Hace mucho tiempo que se dedicaba a la venta de verduras, pero como fue creciendo su negocio, también ella quiso hacer crecer su inversión y multiplicar su ganancia, así que cedicio cambiar de productos y ahora le va mucho mejor, tiene buenas ventas y eso le permite tener mayor ganancia, ahora desea seguir creciendo y poner una fuente de soda en su local. Este será el primer préstamo con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio, además se compromete en ser puntual, ya que no desea quedar mal con el lindo grupo al que pertenece y al cual desea pertenecer por mucho mas tiempo. Con el monto solicitado 800 soles, comprará bebidas en mayor cantidad y variedad ya que en su negocio aumentaron los pedidos y necesita de un capital para poder invertir en nuevos productos.
texts.en:
Delia, aged 66, is a friendly, hard-working and enterprising woman. She is the mother of eight children, whom she has raised and educated alone for many years, because her husband passed away long ago. She lives in her own house with two of her children, with whom she shares her hard daily work in order to have a better life. Delia sells drinks from her store, which she has installed at home and where she offers drinks of various sizes and presentations. She has several brands of soda and also beer for sale. She has an additional store, where she sells gas for domestic consumption. She has been carrying out these activities for two years and she does it alone.

A long time ago Delia was a vegetables seller, but as her business expanded and she wanted to make some investments and earn more money, she decided to change her product range. As a result she does much better now, has good sales and a better income. She still wants to grow and will install a soda fountain in her store. This will be her first loan with the microfinance institution Microfinanzas Prisma. She is very happy to know that she will have financial support and that she is sure to grow her business. She promises to be punctual in her payments, because she doesn't want to be on bad terms with the nice group which she belongs to and still wants to belong to for a very long time.

Delia will use the 800 new soles of her loan to buy a large variety of drinks in bulk, because the demand for drinks is rising and she needs enough capital to invest in more products.

loans.use: to buy more soda and beer.

loans.name: Mutula

texts.en: Mutula is forty-seven years old, married, with two children. He does sugarcane farming to earn a living. He has been in the business for ten years and employs four people. To earn extra income he runs a retail shop. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to grow his business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy fertilizer and chemicals.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and chemicals.

loans.name: Lydiah

texts.en: Lydiah is forty years old. She runs a beauty salon to earn a living, and has been in the business for twelve years. She employs one person. She describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to improve her living standards and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a machine to blow dry hair, a hair drier and hair chemicals.

loans.use: To buy a machine to blow dry hair, a hair drier and hair chemicals.

loans.name: C8058 Ubumwe Group

texts.en:
Seraphine is thirty-six years old and is married with four children between the ages of five and nine. She is the president of the "C8058 Ubumwe" group, and she is the first person on the right side of the photo. 

Seraphine has been selling vegetables for thirteen years. Her business is well organized, and she works from 6am until 1pm every day. Seraphine has requested a loan from Vision Finance company, a Kiva lender, in order to purchase more vegetables to sell. Seraphine plans to use her profits to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Seilita

texts.es: Seilita, de 20 años, es una mujer joven, amable y muy encantadora, es conviviente con Marco de 26 años con quien tiene una hija de 3 años a quien pusieron el nombre de Alexandra, ellos viven en casa de su madre y trabajan mucho para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. El trabajo de Seilita consiste en brindar servicio a sus diversas amigas, vecinas o familiares del cuidado y decoración de las uñas del pie y de las manos, además de brindar cuidados para el cabello, es decir hace corte de cabello, rehidratación y demás exigencias de sus clientes, tiene un pequeño espacio acondicionado en su casa además de trabajar en un centro de servicios de los mismos. Lleva realizando su trabajo por 1 años de manera independiente, y como trabajadora del centro por 3 años. Le gusta su trabajo pues le permite tener tiempo para brindar a su hija, además de poder atender a sus clientes extras quienes van a su casa en busca de sus manos artistas para que les hagan una decoración de sus uñas, tiene muchos clientes y tiene dos ingresos, eso le permite estar bien en su economía y pensar en independizarse, pero para lo cual le hace falta un poco de inversión. Este será el primer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, además se compromete una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, se siente muy feliz de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son buenos clientes y muy responsables. Con el monto solicitado 800 soles, comprará materiales para hacer su trabajo, además de algunos cosméticos y productos del cuidado de las manos y pies.
texts.en:
Seilita, 20, is a young, kind and very charismatic woman who lives with her common-law husband, Marco, 26, and their three-year-old daughter, named Alexandra.  They live with her mother and work hard to provide the best lifestyle they can for their family.  Seilita's work consists of providing manicures, pedicures and hair care to several friends, neighbors and relatives.  She has a small space in her home that she has turned into a beauty shop and also works in another salon.

She has been working independently for a year and in the other salon for three years.  She enjoys what she does because she has time to care for her daughter and also attend to extra customers who come by the house for her special manicures.  She has a lot of customers and two sources of income which give her a stable economy and the possibility to become totally independent.  But in order to do that she needs to invest more money.  This is her first loan through MFP and she is counting on your support to help her meet her goals.  She is committed to paying back the loan on time and is happy to be a part of the communal bank because all the members are so responsible.

She plans to use the 800 PEN to buy supplies for her work, as well as cosmetics and products for manicures and pedicures.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics and supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: C 9274  Abaticumugambi Group

texts.en:
Damien, forty years old, is married and has five children aged between six and fourteen. He operates a well-organized business selling sorghum and beans working from 8 a.m. until 5 p.m. every day. 

Damien is the leader of this group which is called "C9274 Abaticumugambi" in the local language. He has one year of experience. Damien has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand his business by buying more sorghum and beans to sell. He will use any profit generated from this loan to pay his children's school fees and to buy medical insurance for his family. In the photo, Damien is in the middle of the group.

loans.use: To purchase more sorghum and beans to sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is forty-four years old and runs a retail shop to earn a living. She has been in the business for four years and describes her business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able grow her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar and loaves of bread to sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar and loaves of bread to sell.

loans.name: 5686 Ubumwe Group

texts.en:
Juliette is thirty-eight years old. She is married and has three children between the ages of one and thirteen. Her business is well-organized. She runs a restaurant and works from 7am until 5pm every day. 

Juliette is the team leader of this group, which is called "5686 Ubumwe" in the local language. She is the first person on the right side of the photo. Juliette has requested a loan from Kiva lender Vision Finance Company in order to purchase material for her restaurant like tables, chairs and table-ware. With this profit, she will pay her children's school fees, renovate her house and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase material for her restaurant like tables, chairs and table-ware.

loans.name: Zeun

texts.es: Zeun, de 20 años, es un joven emprendedor, amable y trabajador, es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive en casa de sus padres a quienes apoya y desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Zeun consiste en la compra y venta de pescado, durante temporadas realiza viajes a diversos puntos de Perú, se va llevando la variedad de pescados que hay en nuestra zona. Durante su tiempo trabajando en éste negocio está aprendiendo mucho y sobre todo está abriéndose camino a nuevos mercados y está cumpliendo y haciéndose nuevos retos de su vida. Lleva realizando su trabajo por 6 meses y esté muy entusiasmado de saber que podrá seguir con su negocio sabiendo que ésta vez podrá invertir un poco más. Le gusta su negocio, pues le permite viajar y poder conocer gente nueva de quienes aprende y con quienes abre nuevos mercados a donde colocar sus diversos productos, le está yendo muy bien y desea seguir trabajando pues tiene como meta el de hacer crecer su negocio yendo poco a poco. Este será el crédito número 3 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Además se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, está muy contento de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son muy unidos y muy responsables. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará mayor variedad de pescado, ya que tiene pedidos de nuevas especies.
texts.en:
Zeun, 20, is a kind, hard-working entrepreneur who is single and has no children.  He lives with his parents whom he supports, and wants to give them a better lifestyle.  Zeun's work consists of buying and selling fish.  Seasonly, he travels to different parts of Perú to buy a variety of fish.  Ever since he has been working in the business he has learned a lot, especially about how to establish new markets, which he is doing while facing new challenges in his life.  

He has been in business for six months and is very enthusiastic about being able to continue knowing that he will be able to invest a little more this time.  He enjoys what he does because he gets to travel and meet new people, who he learns from and with whom he opens new markets where he sells different products.  Business is going well and he wants to continue working toward his goal of expanding little by little.  

This is his third loan through MFP and he is counting on your support to help him meet his goals.  He is committed to paying back the loan on time just as he has done with his previous loans.  He likes being part of his communal bank because all the members are very united and responsible.  He plans to use the 1,500 PEN to buy a wider variety of fish since he has orders for new species.

loans.use: To buy a wider variety of fish.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: Celia, de 38 años, es una mujer buena y amable, es conviviente con James de 38 años con quien tiene seis hijos, Bany de 17, Bryan de 15, Cristian de 10, James de 6, Denise de 4 y el menor Alexis de 2, ellos viven juntos en una casa propia desde donde a diario educan a sus hijos para poder ser personas de bien en el futuro y a quienes desean dar una mejor calidad de vida. EL trabajo de Celia consiste en brindar el servicio de costura, en su casa tiene un pequeño taller de costura en donde realiza todos los trabajos que le van a encargar y en donde a diario crea sus propias confecciónes. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 10 años en los cuales aprendió mucho sobre este negocio y sobre todo a brindar un buen trato y dar un servicio de calida a sus clientes. Le gusta mucho lo que hace, pues le permite mantenerse distraída, además de que puede disponer de su tiempo y ver su horario de trabajo ella misma, además tiene muchos clientes que van en busca de sus servicios por el buen trabajo que da. Cuando empezó a realizar este negocio le fue un poco complicado pues siempre trabajó en la costura pero para otras personas y no sabia como llevar un negocio propio como el que había empezado, poco a poco fue aprendiendo y ahora es una gran trabajadora de este rubro y desea seguir creciendo para el bienestar de su familia y el de su economía. Este será el crédito número 4 con MFP, por tanto esta muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su negocio, además esta muy comprometido una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, esta contento de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos sus integrantes son responsables y muy buenos entre ellos. Con el monto solicitado 700 soles, comprará materiales y algunas herramientas que necesita para desarrollar mas rápido su trabajo de costura, además de tener un mejor acabado en sus diseños.
texts.en:
Celia, 38, is a good, kind woman who lives with her common-law husband, James, 38, and their six children, Bany, 17, Bryan, 15, Cristian, 10, James, 6, Denise, 4, and the youngest, Alexis, 2.  They live in their own house where they provide the best education and lifestyle they can for their children.  Celia is a seamstress and has a small workshop in her house.  She creates her own fashions and works on an order basis.  For ten years she has been working in this activity and has learned a lot about the business, especially about good customer service and quality.  She enjoys what she does since it keeps her busy while being able to establish her own schedule.  She has many customers because of the good work she does.

When she began it was little complicated because, even though she had always worked as seamstress it was for somebody else and she did not know how to run her own business.  But little by little she learned and now is a great professional in this sector.  She wants to expand for her family's well being and economy.  This is her fourth loan through MFP and she is happying knowing she can count on your support.  This way she knows her business will progress.  She is very committed to paying back the loan on time as she has done with previous loans.  She enjoys her communal bank because all the members are responsible and get along well.  She plans to use the 700 PEN loan to buy supplies and some tools so she can carry out her sewing work more quickly and give her fashions a more professional finish.

loans.use: To buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha is thirty-four years old, married, with one child. She does tailoring to earn a living. She has been in the business for five years and describes her business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a tailoring machine and cloth material.

loans.use: To buy  a tailoring machine and cloth material.

loans.name: C8062 Abadacogora Group

texts.en:
Applinaire is forty-eight years old and is married with one child who is twenty. His business is well organized. He sells clothes in the market, working from 7am until 8pm every day. He is team leader of this group which is called "C8062 Abadacogora" in the local language. 

Applinaire has requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase more clothes to sell. With the profit from the loans, Applinaire will reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Cinthya

texts.es:
Cinthya, de 27 años, es una mujer buena y trabajadora, no le teme a los retos que le presenta la vida, es así que siendo madre soltera de un menor de tres años, sigue adelante ya que desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su menor hijo, ella vive en casa de su madre en donde aporta en la economía y en las tareas que hay que realizar. El trabajo de Cinthya consiste en la venta de comidas y bebidas heladas, asimiso da pension a un grupo de trabajadores que laboran en una empresa cerca de su casa. Lleva está actividad ya por 10 años, pues desde muy niña su mamá le enseñó todo y desde entonces realiza esta actividad junto a ella. Recuerda que poco a poco fue aprendiendo, solo le basto mirar un día y acompañar a su madre para poder aprender y empezar a realizar su propio negocio. En el camino aprendió muchas mas cosas y así es como ahora es una de las cocineras mas reconocidas por su buena sazón en la cuadra en la que vive.
Le gusta todo de su trabajo pues esta contenta por que puede disponer de sus cosas y tiempo, le esta yendo muy bien ya que tiene buenos ingresos, uno de sus metas es poder agrandar su local y empezar un negocio ella sola, pues cree que también es bueno siempre empezar a hacer las cosas solas para adquirir más responsabilidades. Este será el crédito número 6 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para poder continuar aumentando su capital de trabajo, además esta convencida que seguirá siendo la socia beuna y responsable de los créditos obtenidos anteriormente, le gusta pertenecer al banco comunal al que trabaja ya que todos son responsables y muy solidarios entre si. Con el monto solicitado 1800 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos para continuar con su negocio además que desea poder ofrecer mayor variedad de platos a sus diversos comensales que cada vez aumentan mas y mas.
texts.en:
Cinthya, 27, is a good, hard-working woman who is not afraid of the challenges that come up in her life.  She is a single mother of a three-year-old and works to get ahead to give her young son the best quality of life possible.  She lives with her mother and contributes to the household economy and chores.  Cinthya sells food and cold beverages for a living, and also provides meals for a group of workers from a company near her home.  She has been in business for 10 years, having learned to cook from her mother when she was a child.  Her mother works with her, and she remembers how she learned little by little by watching her mother before she began her own business.  Along the way she has learned many more things and now is one of the most renowned cooks on her block because of her delicious food.

She enjoys everything about her work, especially the fact that she can schedule her own time.  Business is going well and she is earning a good income.  One of her goals is to expand her locale and start working alone because she believes it is a good idea to begin doing things on her own to acquire more responsibility.  This is her sixth loan through MFP and she is happying knowing she can count on your support to increase her working capital.  She believes she will continue to be a good, responsible member just as she has been with previous loans.  She enjoys the communal bank because all the members are responsible and very supportive.  She plans to use the 1,800 PEN to buy food ingredients to continue her work, offering a variety of dishes to the growing number of customers she has.

loans.use: To buy food ingredients.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana, de 33 años es una mujer activa y creativa, además ser perseverante y luchadora, es conviviente con el padre de sus dos hijos quienes son menores de 15 y 07 años, ella desea poder brindar lo mejor a sus hijos, mejor educación y mejor calidad de vida. Viven juntos en una casa propia que logró comprar en base a esfuerzo y mucho sacrificio. Juana tiene como trabajo el de la venta de abarrotes y otros productos de primera necesidad; este trabajo lo realiza en su casa; se levanta temprano al mercado a realizar la compra de los productos como pollo; verduras y algunos tubérculos; cuando vuelve saca los productos a la vereda de su casa y empieza con la venta. Lleva ya 5 años en esta actividad que realiza sola, al principio le fue un poco complicado empezar ya que no tenia nada de conocimiento para este negocio, pero con el tiempo aprendió y ahora tiene las pautas necesarias para poder tener contentos a su clientes.
Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede utilizar su tiempo para hacer otras actividades, además cuando tiene un tiempo libre se va al mercado a vender algunos productos, sobre todo sabanas y colchas, le esta yendo bien en su negocio, tiene muchos clientes y esto le genera buenas ganancias. Espera poder seguir trabajando y hacer crecer a su negocio para poder seguir mejorando su economía. Este será el crédito número 11 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para poder continuar aumentando su capital de trabajo, además esta convencida que seguirá siendo la socia beuna y responsable de los créditos obtenidos anteriormente, le gusta pertenecer al banco comunal al que trabaja ya que todos son responsables y muy solidarios entre si. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará mas productos y abarrotes para su tienda, además de comprar bebidas ya que quiere implementarse para poder vender en esta temporada de fuerte sol.
texts.en:
33-year-old Juana is an active and creative woman, as well as persevering and tenacious.  She lives with the father of her two children who are 15 and 7 years old.  Juana would like to provide her children with the best: the best education and the best quality of life.  The family live together in their own home that they worked very hard to buy.

Juana's business is selling groceries and other basic household products.  She does this work from home.  She gets up early in the morning and heads to the market to buy products such as chicken, vegetables and some tubers.  When she gets back she displays the products on the sidewalk outside her home and starts selling.  Juana has been in this business for five years and she works alone.  At first it was a little difficult for her to start because she didn't have any knowledge of this business.  However, she learned over time and now she knows how to keep her customers happy.  What she enjoys about her work is that she can use her time to carry out other activities and when she has any spare time she is able to go to the market to sell some products (mainly sheets and bedspreads).  She is doing well in her business as she has a lot of customers which makes her good profits.  She hopes to be able to continue working and growing her business so that she can continue improving her financial situation.

This will be Juana's 11th loan from MFP and she is very happy to know that she will have financial support so that she can continue increasing her working capital.  She is also certain that she will continue being a good and responsible member when it comes to repaying her loans as she has been up to now.  Juana enjoys belonging to her community bank because the bank's members are all responsible and very supportive of each other.  She will use the 1,000 soles she has requested to buy more products and groceries for her business.  She will also buy drinks as she would like to stock up so that she can sell them during this intensely sunny season.

loans.use: to buy basic household products and soda

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia, de 28 años, es una mujer amable y muy responsable, es conviviente con Héctor de 35 años, con quien tiene una hija de 7 meses de nacida, ellos viven en su casa propia y trabajan mucho para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su menor hija. Lidia, tiene como trabajo la venta de bebidas, cada tres días pasa por su casa el camión repartidor de gaseosas y agua mineral y es ahí cuando ella aprovecha y surte su negocio y compra algunos paquetes para tener en stock en su almacén, también compra cervezas que pone a la venta solo al publico mayor de edad. Como toda mujer luchadora, ella siempre está a la expectativa de algún negocio y ahora está también vendiendo gas domestico. Lleva realizando su trabajo ya por 2 años consecutivos y está muy orgullosa de decir que para empezar su negocio tuvo el apoyo de MFP que le ayudo con la primera inversión. Le gusta mucho lo que hace, pues le permite tener tiempo disponible para estar a lado de su niña, además que le significa un ingreso adicional a la economía que sostiene junto a su conviviente, espera seguir creciendo y mas adelante tener una distribuidora de bebidas. Este será el crédito número 4 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que recibirá el apoyo financiero para poder continuar con su trabajo y así mejorar su capital, además se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en otros crédito que tuvo, por otro lado menciona que se siente muy cómoda en su banco comunal ya que sus compañeros son responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará bebidas para tener en stock, ya que desea tener mayor cantidad, variedad y presentación que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lidia, 28, is a friendly and responsible woman. She lives with her partner Hector, 35, with whom she has a daughter of 7 months. They live in their own home and work hard to be able to provide a good quality of life to their small daughter. 

Lidia’s work is selling drinks. Every three days a truck passes by her house selling soda and mineral water. Lidia takes advantage of this and purchases some packages of drinks to stock her shelves. She also purchases beer that she sells only to adults. Like any woman fighter, she is always on the lookout for new business opportunities. Now she also sells household gas. She has done this work for 2 consecutive years and is really proud to say that she started the business with the support of MFP, who helped her with the initial start-up capital. She really likes what she does, especially since it allows her time to be at her daughter’s side. In addition, it is another source of income, alongside that of her partner’s, to sustain the family. She hopes to keep growing, and in the future, have a distributor of drinks.

This will be her 4th loan with MFP. She is pleased to know that she will receive financial support to continue in her work and be able to improve her capital. In addition, she commits once again to making her loan payments, just as she did with her previous loans. She says that she feels very comfortable with her communal bank because her companions are responsible and united. With the requested amount of 2500 Nuevos Soles (PEN), she will purchase drinks to have in stock because she wants to have a greater amount and variety of drinks and better presentation to offer her customers.

loans.use: purchase more soda and beer

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 53 años, es una mujer amable y emprendedora, es madre de tres hijas quienes ya son mayores e independientes, vive en su casa propia que recién compró gracias a los ahorros de muchos años. Esta casada y su esposo se encuentra trabajando en otra ciudad, ahora ella vive sola pero trabaja mucho pues desea tener un mejor futuro para su vejez. María, se dedica a la venta de comida en un mercado conocido de la ciudad, este negocio empezó a lado de sus dos hijas con quienes ha formando sociedad. Antes ella se dedicaba a la venta de abarrotes en la casa de su hija pero no le dio resultados, ahora lleva con este negocio  seis meses y esta poniéndole todas las ganas y todo el entusiasmo posible para seguir adelante. Durante este tiempo realizando este trabajo, hay cosas que le siguen pareciendo desconocidos y cosas que le llenan de emoción, espera poder crecer junto a sus hijas y siente que va en el buen camino ya que hasta ahora en estos meses esta ganando muchos clientes, aun recuerda hace seis meses cuando empezó a recorrer el camino a este su nuevo trabajo, pues estaba llena de dudas pero con muchos ánimos e ilusiones. Tanto esfuerzo tuvo sus logros y ahora esta pensando ampliar su local y así poder tener mejores ingresos. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP, siempre fue muy buena socia en su banco comunal en donde la quieren mucho por que es muy responsable y solidaria, espera que le puedan brindar el préstamo que será un respaldo para ella y seguir aumentando su negocio, esta convencida que seguirá siendo una socia muy puntual y pagara sus cuotas a tiempo como todos los prestamos que tuvo hasta ahora. Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos necesarios para poder empezar a cocinar nuevos platos de comida y así ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
53-year-old María is a kind and entrepreneurial woman.  She is the mother of three daughters who are all adults and live independently.  María lives in her own home which she recently bought thanks to having saved up for many years.  She is married and her husband is working in another city.  Right now she lives alone but she works hard because she would like to enjoy a better future in her old age.  

María's business is selling cooked food in a well-known market in the city.  She started this business in partnership with two of her daughters.  Before this she used to sell groceries from her daughter's house but it was not successful.  She has been in this business for six months now and she is putting all her drive and enthusiasm into making progress in it.  During the time that she has been carrying out this work, there are things that continue seeming strange to her and others that fill her with excitement.  She hopes to be able to grow the business together with her daughters and she feels that they are on the right path because they have been attracting many customers over recent months.  She still remembers six months ago when she started out in her new business, how she was full of doubts but also a lot of determination and hope.  All her efforts have paid off and now she is thinking of expanding her sales location so that she can make more income.

This will be María's fourth loan from MFP.  She has always been a very good member of her community bank where she is very well liked because she is responsible and supportive.  She hopes that she will be able to receive a loan as it will be a support for her and she will be able to continue expanding her business.  She is certain that she will continue being a very punctual member and will make her repayments on time as she has with the loans she has received up to now.  María will use the 2,500 soles she has requested to buy ingredients and supplies she needs for cooking new dishes, so that she can offer her customers more choices.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making food

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia, de 28 años, es una mujer buena y amable, es madre de dos niños de 12 y 7 años, ella vive a lado de su conviviente en una casa propia, desea poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y es por eso que trabaja mucho para así lograr brindarles un mejor educación y hacerles personas productivas para la sociedad.
Delia tiene como trabajo el de confección de sus propios diseños de ropa en lycra (ropas interiores, pantaloneras, blusas, etc.) ella poco a poco formo su pequeño pero muy productivo taller en su casa propia que logro comprarse ahora ultimo, cuenta que hace tiempo ella era trabajadora de una señor que distribuía en un centro comercial llamado el huequito de la ciudad, pero con el tiempo se dio cuenta que ella también podría realizar sus propios diseños ya que es muy buena en lo que hace esto se refleja en que todos los días tiene ventas. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es que todos los días su dinero esta en movimiento y eso genera ingresos diarios, además de disponer de su tiempo, esta muy contenta con los créditos obtenidos en MFP por que dice que son muy bajos en cuanto al interés. Le gustaría más adelante poder tener un taller más amplio y empezar a distribuir a los comercios al por mayor dentro de la ciudad. Este será el crédito número 3 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para poder continuar aumentando su capital de trabajo, además esta convencida que seguirá siendo la socia beuna y responsable de los créditos obtenidos anteriormente, le gusta pertenecer al banco comunal al que trabaja ya que todos son responsables y muy solidarios entre si. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará materiales para continuar con su trabajo, además de implementarse con una maquina remalladora para si poder tener un mejor acabado y de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Delia, 28, is a good, kind woman who is the mother of two children, aged 12 and 7.  She lives with her common-law husband in their own home where they strive to give their children the best lifestyle possible.  This is the reason they work hard to give them a good education so they can be productive citizens.

Delia is a seamstress and makes her own lycra fashions (lingerie, trousers, blouses).  Little by little she set up her small, industrious workshop in her own house, which she just bought.  She used to work for a man who was a distributor for a shopping center called El Huequito in the city, but over time she realized that she could make her own designs because she is quite good at what she does, as seen by her sales volume.

What she enjoys most about her work is that she receives a daily income and also can schedule her own time.  She is very happy with the loans she has had through MFP, which she says had a very low interest rate.  In the future she would like to have a larger workshop and begin distributing on a wholesale basis to shops in the city.  This is her third loan through MFP and she is glad she can count on financial support to continue increasing her work capital.  She believes she will be as responsible this time as she has been with previous loans.  She likes her communal bank because all the members are responsible and very supportive.  The 1,500 PEN loan will be used to buy supplies so she can continue her work, as well as an overlock sewing machine so her garmets will have a more professional finish to them.

loans.use: To buy an overlock sewing machine and supplies.

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es: Maryleny, de 34 años, es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora, vive en casa propia junto a su conviviente y sus tres hijos, aprendió en la vida a ser organizada y a dar una tarea del hogar a cada integrante y es así como enseña a ser responsable a sus hijos. Ella desea brindar una buena educación y lograr que sus hijos sean personas buenas para sociedad. El trabajo de Maryleny consiste en  la siembra de verduras y frutas regionales, se va cuatro veces a la semana a su chacra, ubicada cerca a un puerto de botes que se inunda en época de creciente pero en época de verano se vuelve una playa, así poder realizar sembríos. Lleva ya tres años con este trabajo y lo realiza a lado de su conviviente. Le gusta mucho su trabajo pues considera que es bueno no ser dependiente de alguien si no tener disponibilidad de tiempo por que es algo propio, y como le da tiempo para poder realizar otras actividades, le esta yendo muy bien debido a que a lo largo de los años que ha estado trabajando, ha logrado obtener un mercado muy amplio en donde ofrece sus productos que son muy buscados por su calidad y alto valor nutritivo. Ahora tiene muchas cosas en mente para poder realizar en un futuro, pero por el momento lo que desea es poder armar el cerco de su chacra y proteger a sus plantas de las personas malas que entran a robar. Este será el crédito número 3 con la institución MFP, siempre fue muy buena socia en su banco comunal en donde la quieren mucho por que es muy responsable y solidaria, espera que le puedan brindar el préstamo que será un respaldo para ella y seguir aumentando su negocio, esta convencida que seguirá siendo una socia muy puntual y pagara sus cuotas a tiempo como todos los prestamos que tuvo hasta ahora. Con el monto solicitado 500 soles, comprará madera y clavos para poder cercar su chacra, además comprará algunas semillas y abono para poder fertilizar a sus tierras.
texts.en:
34-year-old Maryleny is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who lives in her own home together with her partner and their three children.  Maryleny learned how to be organized in life and how to give a chore to every member of her household.  This is how she teaches her children to be responsible.  She would like to provide her children with a good education and ensure that they become upstanding citizens.

Maryleny's work consists of sowing regional fruit and vegetables.  She goes out to her farm four times a week.  It is located near a port that floods during the high water level season and then in summer the beach returns and crops can be sown.  Maryleny has been in this business for three years now and she carries out her work alongside her partner.  She really enjoys her work as she considers it to be a good thing not having to depend on anybody and it is good to be in charge of your own time because you are working for yourself.  Also, you have time free to carry out other activities.  The business is doing very well because, throughout the years that she has been working, she has managed to attract a very large market to whom she offers her produce.  Her produce is very much in demand because of its quality and high nutritional value.  Right now Maryleny has many plans in mind for the future but, for now, what she would like is to erect a fence around her farm to protect her plants from bad people who come in to steal them.

This will be Maryleny's third loan from MFP.  She has always been a very good member of her community bank where she is very well liked because she is responsible and supportive.  She hopes that she will receive a loan as it will be a support for her and she will be able to continue expanding her business.  She is certain that she will continue being a very punctual member and will make her loan repayments on time as she has done with the loans she has received up to now.  She will use the 500 soles that she has requested to buy wood and nails so that she can fence in her farm.  She will also buy some seeds and fertilizers so that she can fertilize her land.

loans.use: to buy wood and nails to fence in her farm.  She will also buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 47 años, es una mujer amable y emprendedora, es soltera y no tiene hijos pues durante su vida dedico a sus padres y a su familia, vive en su casa propia junto a sus hermanas, su cuñada y a los que le inspiran trabajar a diario para poder brindarles lo mejor. El trabajo de Rosa, consiste en la venta de abarrotes, a diario o pasando un día se dirige al mercado mayorista de la ciudad en donde hace las compras necesaria para volver a surtir su negocio con los productos que se terminaron, ella tiene un dicho “trata bien al cliente, bríndale lo que necesita y ten todo lo que busca y volverá siempre” es por eso que ella no se descuida en tener de todo un poco para así poder tenerlos siempre satisfechos. Su negocio esta en su casa en donde tiene la ayuda de su madre que siempre esta a su lado, lleva realizando tres años este trabajo y aprendió mucho sobre como realizarlo. Le gusta mucho su trabajo pues le permite tener tiempo para algunas otras actividades e ingresos extras que pueda tener, además de permitirle tener buenos ingresos para su hogar lo cual es fundamental para ella ya que se encarga de la mayoría de los gastos efectuados en su casa, tiene muchos planes a futuro pero lo principal para ella es poder hacer crecer su negocio y así tener mayores ingresos. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por tanto esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio, además esta muy comprometida una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en el anterior crédito que tuvo, esta contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos sus integrantes son responsables y muy buenos entre ellos. Con el monto solicitado 1200 soles, comprará mercadería para su negocio, ya que desea ampliar ahora con venta de bebidas y algunas carnes.
texts.en:
47-year-old Rosa is a kind and entrepreneurial woman.  She is single and doesn't have any children because she has spent her life devoted to her parents and her family.  She lives in her own home together with her sisters and sister-in-law.  They inspire her to work every day so that she can provide them with the best.  

Rosa's business is selling groceries.  She makes her sales every day or, taking a day off, she heads to the wholesale market in the city where she makes the purchases she needs to re-stock her business with the items she has run out of.  She has a saying "Treat your customer well, give them what they need and have everything they are looking for and they will always come back".  For this reason, Rosa always makes sure she has a little bit of everything so that she can keep her customers happy.  Her business is located in her home and she has the help of her mother who is always by her side.  She has been in this business for three years and she has learned a lot about it.  She really enjoys her work as it leaves her time free to carry out other activities and make extra income.  It also makes her good income for her household which is very important for her as she takes care of most of her household's expenses.  Rosa has many plans for the future but the most important thing for her is to be able to grow her business and make more income.

This will be Rosa's second loan from MFP and she is very happy to know that she will have financial support as it will make her feel secure in making progress in her business.  Once again, she is very much committed to making her loan repayments on time as she did with her previous loan.  She is happy to belong to her community bank because all the members are responsible and very kind to each other.  Rosa will use the 1,200 soles she has requested to buy merchandise for her business as she would like to expand her business by adding the sale of drinks and some meats.

loans.use: to buy basic household products, soda and meat

loans.name: Susana

texts.es: Susana, de 59 años, es una mujer amable, buena y emprendedora, por cosas de la vida se separo del que fue su pareja por mucho años y tuvo que criar a sus cuatro hijos ella sola. Gracias a su perseverancia algunos sacrificios logro hacerlos personas de bien quienes ahora son independientes y en algunos casos le ayudan con algunos gastos, ella vive en su casa propia en donde le acompaña a diario su nieta Alexandra de 13 años a quien cría y desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Todos los días Susana se levanta muy temprano, realiza algunas labores de su hogar y en seguida abre su tienda de abarrotes, pues ella sabe que mientras mas temprano abre tendrá mas ventas y por ende más ganancias. Su negocio esta en su casa y tiene la ayuda de su nieta a quien esta enseñando que hay que trabajar para obtener las cosas pero siempre sin descuidar los estudios. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 6 años y le esta yendo muy bien, vende mucho y eso le permite tener buenas ganancias, espera seguir trabajando juntos ya que desea mucho concretar sus planes de expandir su negocio, hacerle crecer y mas adelante poder tener un minimarket o una tienda mas grande y mucho mas surtida. Pero sabe que el camino es largo y así como un día empezó poco y ahora le va mejor, sabe que tendrá que trabajar mucho para poder lograr el objetivo que se trazo. Este será el primer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para poder continuar con su negocio ya que desea avanzar poco a poco y poder crecer en lo que hace, a cambio del apoyo que desea recibir ella se compromete a pagar sus cuotas a tiempo pues no desea quedar mal con los que le brindan el apoyo y desea poder integrarse rápidamente a este grupo que son de socios responsables. Con el monto solicitado 500 soles, comprará mas mercadería para ofrecer a sus clientes y así cumplir con las exigencias de los mismos.
texts.en:
59-year-old Susana is a nice, kind, entrepreneurial woman.  She separated from her partner many years ago and had to bring up her four children on her own.  Thanks to her perseverance and some sacrifices, she was able to ensure they became upstanding citizens who now live independently and, in some cases, help her with some of her expenses.  Susana lives in her own home where she is accompanied every day by her granddaughter, 13-year-old Alexandra, who she is bringing up and who she would like to provide with a better quality of life. 

Every day Susana gets up very early, does some household chores, and then opens her grocery store.  She knows that the earlier she opens, the more sales she will make and hence the more profits she will make.  Her business is located in her home and she has the help of her granddaughter who she is teaching that you have to work in order to obtain things, but without ever neglecting her studies.  Susana has been in her business for six years and it is doing very well.  She sells a lot and this allows her to make very good profits.  She hopes to continue working together as she is very keen to carry out her plans to expand her business and, in the future, have a mini-market or a larger and much better-stocked store.  However, she knows that the road is long and, in the same way that she started out one day with very little and is now doing better, she knows that she will have to work hard to achieve the goal that she has set herself.

This will be Susana's first loan from MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial support which will enable her to continue in her business as she would like to make gradual progress and grow her business.  In return for the support that she would like to receive, she pledges to make her loan repayments on time.  She does not want to let down the people who provided her with the support she needs and she would like to be able to quickly settle into her group as they are all responsible people.  Susana will use the 500 soles she has requested to buy more merchandise to offer her customers.  This will enable her to meet their needs.

loans.use: to buy more products to stock her business

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is 61 years old, she is a mother of two children.  She sells ropes to earn a living and has been in this business for fifteen years.  To earn extra income, she does maize farming.  

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to educate her children and hopes to be financially stable in the future.  She has applied for a loan of 15,000 Kenya Shillings to buy ropes to sell.

loans.use: to buy ropes to sell.

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen is 45 years old, she is a mother of two children.  She does potato farming to earn a living and has been in the business for seven years and employs three people.  To earn extra income, she does maize farming. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business in the future.  She has applied for a loan of 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy potato seeds for planting.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds for planting.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Benard is forty-three years old and married with five children.  He does welding to earn a living and he has been in this business for four years; he employs one person.  He does potato farming to earn extra income.  

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to educate his children and hopes to expand his business in the future.  He has applied for a loan of 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a new welding machine.

loans.use: to buy a new welding machine.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is seventy-two years old and married with seven children.  He does tailoring to earn a living and he has been in this business for twenty-six years; he employs one person.  He does livestock farming to earn extra income.  

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to provide for his family and hopes to expand his business in the future.  He has applied for a loan of 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a sewing machine and cloth material.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and cloth material.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana, de 27 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Es conviviente con Luis quien es comerciante y padre de sus 3 hijos Jouliet, Luis y Luciano de 7, 5 y 1 años de edad respectivamente a quienes quiere mucho. Juntos habitan cómodamente una casa alquilada en compañía de su hermana y su sobrino. La a actividad que realiza Ana  es la venta de frutas regionales y refrescos de diversos sabores. Para eso instala todos los días una mesa en el frontis de su casa  donde acomoda sus frutas y sus refrescos y los oferta teniendo bastante acogida por su tarto amable y el buen sabor de sus refrescos. 
Se inicios hace más de 2 años con un préstamo de MFP, y hasta el momento los viene realizando ella sola, pero en ocasiones le apoya su hermana.
Asimismo considera a su negocio bastante rentable por los ingresos que le deja y la buena acogida que tiene su negocio. Se decidió a empezar con su negocio por necesidad de contar con un oficio para generarse sus propios ingresos, además que en ocasiones los ingresos de su pareja no les alcanzaba, tomando la decisión de apoyarlo con los gatos del hogar , buscando brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
Por tanto, ahora viendo los buenos resultados que está teniendo, desea continuar con su negocio e incursionar en la venta de abarrotes para eso quiere abrir una bodega en su casa. Este será el préstamo número 3 con la institución MFP. Se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibirá, de esa manera se sentirá más segura para avanzar con sus planes. Además comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues lo considera un grupo colaborador y responsable. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles,, los invertirá en la compra de bebidas gaseosas para surtir su negocio , también en frutas variadas buscando precios cómodos por sus compras para así tener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
27-year-old Ana is a hard-working and determined woman who has a great desire to make progress in life.  She lives with her partner Luis who is a salesman and the father of her three children Jouliet, Luis and Luciano, who are 7, 5 and 1 and who she loves very much.  They live comfortably together in a rental house together with her sister and her nephew.

Ana's business is selling regional fruit and different flavored drinks.  Every day she sets up a table in front of her home where she places her fruit and drinks and then offers them for sale.  Her business is popular thanks to her kind manner and the good flavor of her drinks.  Ana started this business more than two years ago with a loan from MFP and, up to now, she has been working alone.  However, her sister sometimes supports her.  She considers her business to be fairly profitable because of the income it makes her and how popular it is.  She decided to start this business because she needed work which would allow her to make her own income.  Sometimes her partner's income wasn't enough and so she took the decision to help him with their household expenses so that they could provide their children with a better quality of life.  Now that she sees the good results she is having, she would like to continue in her business and also start selling groceries.  She would like to open a store in her home for this.

This will be Ana's third loan from MFP.  She feels grateful for the financial support that she receives as it makes her feel more secure in making progress with her plans.
